name: Fenrir's fury
description: Unleash Fenrir's vengeance. Explore, fight enemies, and make crucial decisions. Trust no one. Seek revenge.

name: Fashion Holiday: A Game of Texas Hold 'Em
description: Unleash your poker skills in "Fashion Holiday: A Game of Texas Hold 'Em," where a mall-bound evening sets the stage for playful matches against intriguing characters. With 32 stunning outfit choices, immerse yourself in light-hearted dialogue and stylish 4K art.

name: Exchange Student
description: Exchange Student is an exciting visual novel for adults only, full of unexpected twists and unforgettable moments. You'll take on the role of James, a young student who decides to make a fresh start by moving to a new city and embarking on his university studies.

name: Cynostone
description: An ALL NEW RPG with skill based combat and enemies you can befriend!

name: Cyberside Picnic
description: Cyberside Picnic is a eulogy for the cyberian commonplace that just eluded us. A love letter to a lost future of alternative video games, delete and overwrite.

name: I Commissioned Some Pigeons
description: I paid more artists to hide pigeons and bread in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Hungry Dogs
description: Quick arcade strategy hungry fun getting items in the backyard of wild dogs that hungry in wild.

name: Hentai: Mission Bombass
description: Sin descripción

name: Gulch Guardians
description: cute + tough card tactics autobattles

name: Gentlemen's Puzzle Club
description: Try to complete all puzzles in this amazing relaxation game and collect all locked girls behind the covers.

name: Furry Toys
description: Furry Toys - is a classic 2D game in the memory genre which is about you find the same pictures and enjoy different images of furry beautiful ladies.

name: Heavy Metal Titans
description: Heavy Metal Titans is a modern-retro Run n' Gun Shoot ‘em up that takes players on a blood-soaked time traveling quest to defeat General Glen Planamento and retrieve the stolen time crystal, a powerful relic that can manipulate time and reality.

name: Hot Rider
description: Dynamic racing with a good soundtrack, compete with the rest and become the best!

name: True Driver
description: Take a seat, start the engine and enjoy high speed! Choose between freemode, countdown and helirace. If you like challenges, you are at the right place! Race with time or with a helicopter! Sounds easy, right? Your blissed car is prepared for your journey, so what are you waiting for?

name: Tower Walker - The Ancient Ones
description: Tower Walker - The Ancient Ones adds exclusive bonus content. 6 new ancient playable races with special and unique racial traits.

name: The Silicon Shadow
description: An early 1900's retro futuristic sci-fi Movement Shooter. Glide and shoot through murderous robots, navigate platforming challenges and explore a dark and atmospheric space station to uncover the truth of its downfall in this short length game.

name: The Pulse of Evil
description: Find yourself on a mission exploring the depth of an ominous forgotten mine. You arrive barehanded but quickly find the tools needed to go deeper. Destroy the infected living parts of the mine and face the final threat and complete your mission.

name: Snoody: One of the Ayrie
description: Bring back color to the wonderful planet Ayries! Together with Snoody and his friend Picke go on an exciting adventure to other planets. Explore distant worlds, study elemental magic, collect crystals and defeat monsters! Save the people of ayrie and find out, who is responsible for their troubles.

name: Sparky Marky: Episode 2
description: It's your first day at Amber's Park - strange recreational camp for children. Complete employee training and meet Sparky - a friendly mascot at day, Kinder Surprise with a monster inside at night. Solve puzzles to deactivate Sparky and save your life.

name: Street Fighting Grandma
description: Guide the Grandma through the mean streets and figure out what is really happening in the city

name: Sunny Girl
description: Enjoy cute girls in the background of gentle music and complete puzzles. The game is a jigsaw puzzle, where players move puzzle pieces to restore the original image.

name: Striker Zone
description: Join in with friends in a online shooter about modern warfare!

name: Riverflow
description: Let the river flow, and nourish the land.

name: Sáivu
description: Sáivu: Spill basert på samisk kultur. Utforsk 8 årstider med unike utfordringer. Vinn gaver til offersteinen. Hjelpespill: Joikememory, eventyr, overnaturlige. Bygg lavvo, joik dyr, lag medisin, bekjemp overnaturlige, jakt, fang rein, lag duodji, fisk på isen. Avslutningsspørsmål om læring.

name: Settris
description: "Settris" is a block-placement puzzle game in which players place pieces in the empty squares on the puzzle board, and fill all empty squares to clear the board.

name: RockTop
description: Rock Top VR game is an online gameplay that adds multiplayer chase to traditional VR climbing gameplay. In addition to conquering different terrains, players can also play different roles in multiplayer mode to obtain more gems

name: Sex on Beach
description: Sex on Beach - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Restaurant Simulator 2023
description: Welcome to Restaurant Simulator 2023! Experience the joy of running your own restaurant in this cute and relaxing economy game. With charming graphics, automate your workflow to maximize income, hire managers to keep your workers motivated, and make smart investments to boost your economy!

name: Redline Crooks
description: Redline Crooks is a fast-paced roguelite vehicle combat game in which you destroy cops, walls and possibly yourself in a chaotic pursuit of freedom and riches. Upgrade, Slam, Taunt and Boost your way out of imprisonment through the lawless roads that lie ahead, and you may find personal absolution.

name: Popologist: Camera Slinger
description: You are on assignment of a newspaper company. “The POPOLOGIST”, on a mission to capture photo images of events, people & objects throughout the city within your cameras battery life & memory allotted. Overshoot & you cant complete all assignments. Will Your Pics make Front Page News?

name: Pixel Punk
description: Pixel Punk is a strategy tower defence. In pixel Punk you build different turrets that will protect you against the never ending waves.

name: Oome
description: "In oOme, control time with your mouse, make the celestial bodies dance, feed your black hole, but avoid contact. A relaxing and hypnotic arcade game."

name: Nightmare Zapping
description: A horror channel browsing game where each channel holds a different nightmare to experience, explore them and find out the truth about what has happened in a small town where the inhabitants have disappeared.

name: Neon Fantasy: Girls
description: Neon Fantasy: Girls is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Murder at Mystic High
description: Cute visual novel murder mystery game

name: NextNight
description: This is a third person tower defense game where you need to use the space wisely to place defenses to kill zombies at night.

name: Kāla
description: You were born in a mining colony far below the surface of Planet Kāla, sentenced to an indefinite quarantine. Legends suggest that the spirit of the planet, Gaia Kāla helps those who prove their worth. Can you escape the grasp of Synterra's Mineral Corporation?

name: Idle Magic Legend
description: Team up to kill monsters and explode equipment. Through the program, thousands of people practice, make friends, and get married. You can also participate. You can become friends with her and learn magic together. Bring your dog to battle

name: Mango's Wonderland
description: Mango's Wonderland is a free horror game where you play as a detective that needs to try to find anything about an old theme park called Mango's Wonderland. You need to solve puzzles to get ahead in the old theme park and survive old animatronics that used to be attractions there...

name: Market Warfare
description: Lead the Fruit Army and defend your base from the evil vegetables in this Tower Defense game.-Create your strategy with a variety of characters.-Adapt to different scenarios-Manage your money to keep your defense line full of fruits.

name: Mahjong Travel
description: Journey into the world of mahjong! Colorful locations, pleasant music and interesting levels will meet you on your way!

name: Lita's Dream
description: Popular high school girl Lita finds herself trapped in a strange dreamlike world. She needs to escape from a dangerous, eerie castle with the help of her mysterious ally, Ian.

name: LabyrInk
description: LabyrInk is the result of a 5-day Game Jam. It's an exciting third person shooter where the environment starts out completely invisible. You and other Goblinks must paint it up in order to reveal a path to your opponents. Features two distinct game modes: Last One Standing and Deathmatch.

name: Legend of Hidden Flows
description: 《Legend of Hidden Flows》It is a sandbox Immortal cultivation game that combines strategy card construction, open world ,and role-playing.You can experience a different life in this world.

name: Idle: Generators
description: An IDLE game for your fun and relaxation. Generators based gameplay and two prestige systems with various gameplay possibilities

name: Broken Picture Telephone
description: Broken Picture Telephone, sometimes abbreviated BPT, was a collaborative multiplayer online drawing and writing game invented in 2007, based on the pen-and-paper game Telephone Pictionary.

name: Doodle or Die
description: It's like the game of "telephone" with drawings. Given no context, doodle the provided phrase or describe a stranger's drawing. After submitting, see the full chain and keep up with responses to your own contributions.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Voyager of Time
description: A mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time that includes a new story and updated environments

name: Underworld Unfinished Business 3: The Plain of Jars
description:
The fourth entry in The Lizard King series. This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2006.

name: Underworld Unfinished Business 4: Taking Care of Business
description:
The fifth entry in The Lizard King series. This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2008.

name: The Lost Valley
description:
This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2016.

name: The Eastermansion
description:
This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles. This TRLE was made for Easter.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2012.

name: Megankreuzstilette
description: It is a hack of Megaman 3 whose main novelty is the use of Megaman 3 Improvement.

name: NetGame Adventure
description:
NetGame Adventure is a short puzzle-horror adventure game.

Explore the 'Haunted Journey' server of a forgotten browser game.

name: Star Wars: Episode 1 - Director's Cut
description:
This is a Stand Alone Game. It is not compatible with the Lara At The Movies project and cannot be substituted into that game. It is a tribute to the wonderful Star Wars adventures. This release is in response to feedback from some players who had difficulty with the original Lara at the Movies version of these levels. I have called this new release the Director's Cut as it contains material not included in the original version (one new playable level and two cutscenes). The original levels have been significantly revamped with revised texturing, atmosphere and additional audio. The timed runs and podracing events should now be playable by players of all skill levels.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2007.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Remembering
description: In the biggest story update yet, uncover the mystery of the Forgetting in the Forgotten Lands Biome with help from a magical resident of the mysterious Pumpkin House. Journey through the Dreamscape—the dimension between Dreams and Reality—and experience epic story Quests alongside your Disney and Pixar friends in the Valley.

name: 100 Doors Mystery Adventures
description: Get ready to escape all possible places dedicated to different rooms and location, solve enigma and open the door. Uncover the new mystery of an adventure. 100 doors escape journey is the sequel of point and click nature with more riddling puzzles. Try to break all the doors and mysterious locks. Prove yourself and solve the baffle to exit the room.

name: Starmate
description: Once you’ve rescued your first Starmate you won’t be able to stop until you’ve saved them all. These cute creatures are here to help you take down the Keplers, evil aliens who are bent on destroying the galaxy!

name: Yamb
description: Yamb is dice game played with 5 or 6 dices. It is more complex variant of popular international Yahtzee game.

name: Metro Pocket
description: In a cartoonish world, you can unlock and upgrade 300 metro stations around the world! Workers including controllers, cleaners, and police officers will help you maintain peace in your stations. With numerous missions to complete and hidden surprises waiting, are you ready to become the master of the metro?

name: Echo Blade
description:
A strategic, satisfying, slash 'em up puzzle game that will have you hooked from the first swipe.
Ready to join our hero on a thrilling quest across 3 unique worlds? Harness your strategic skills across 21 thrilling levels, facing off against diverse enemies, each with their own distinct behaviours.

name: SkyFall Slime: Freefall Feast
description:
"SkyFall Slime: Freefall Feast" is the ultimate freefall game designed for thrill-seekers of all ages! With its vibrant cartoony visuals, easy-to-learn controls, and challenging gameplay, your aerial journey will never be the same!
Our characters, lovable mixes of slime and balloon, tumble from the sky, shrinking as they fall. Keep them plump by swiping to collect falling food, but beware! The sky isn't as friendly as it seems. Dodge dangerous spikes that can instantly deflate your character and end your thrilling descent.
As you navigate this airborne world, pick up precious pearls to unlock new characters. With a myriad of colorful, cartoony characters to choose from, you'll find endless joy as you take to the skies.

name: Starship Survivor
description:
Starship Survivor by Brainium is a thrilling new rogue-lite shoot ‘em up game! Experience the action as you battle hordes of alien monsters that are terrorizing the universe. From the moment your ship leaves the Hangar it is a race against time to defeat enemies and collect all of the resources you can before the indestructible Void Monsters arrive. Collect power crystals to level-up an arsenal of automated weapons to survive waves of vicious alien enemies. There is nowhere to hide; the only option is to charge your starship’s Jump Drive enough to escape the onslaught of dangerous monsters. Use coins to unlock weapons, items, and permanent upgrades that will help you complete objectives and survive against increasingly powerful and multiplying enemy invaders in sectors to come.
Starship Survivor is a galactic time survival game with the best virtual joystick ever created! Enjoy retro space shooter elements, intuitive controls, unique gameplay, and increasingly powerful enemy invaders that will put your skills to the test. See how long you can collect, destroy, power-up, and survive.

name: Magical Girl Maho
description: The more I play the game, the more become difficult to quit! Contrary to the waffy and kawaii appearance, a full-scale, addictive card game with deep strategic nature appeared! Maps, cards, items, all change every time you play the game... Collect cards and build a deck from lots of choices! Become the brain of cute but a bit blunder witch, “Maho”, Beat the sweets burglar “Biscuit Baron!”

name: Super Hit Baseball
description: Fun 2 Inning Baseball Games ! Quick Tap Baseball Battles - The Best in Action Arcade Sports Games! Fun Free Online multiplayer PVP Baseball games

name: Swipe Manager: Soccer 2018
description:
Think you could do a better job than Gareth or Pep? Do you have what it takes to motivate teams of overpaid prima donnas while keeping your Chairman onside, stopping the fans from protesting outside your home, and the press from running that story about a donkey? Take the job of managing one of the league’s biggest clubs, or work your way up with a team of relegation strugglers - the choice is yours.
Whether it's dealing with terrible VAR decisions, players going rogue or greedy agents, Swipe Manager: Soccer 2018 is a ‘choose your own adventure’ game where you call the shots. Make all the key decisions via a card dragging mechanic – simply move the card left or right to see your choice of answers and then let go to select.
Each season promises to be filled with tough calls and nail biting football action where you call the shots and define the tactics. This is management like you've never experienced before! Unless you played Swipe Manager: Soccer last year...

name: Truck Simulator USA Revolution
description:
From the makers of Bus Simulator 2023 comes the new and improved Truck Simulator USA Revolution. Want to know what driving an 18 Wheeler feels like? Truck Simulator USA offers a real trucking experience that will let you explore amazing locations. This American Truck Simulator features many American and European semi truck brands and all kinds of big rigs with realistic engine sounds and detailed interiors! Drive across America, transport cool trailers such as vehicles, gasoline, gravel, food, ship anchors, helicopters, and many more… Become a professional truck driver and enjoy the career and the online multiplayer mode!
Drive your favorite American or Euro truck across the American continent, play Truck Simulator USA Revolution!

name: Cruise Control
description: Escape pursuing cops, helicopters, dinosaurs, giant eagles and vector polygons. With easy to pick up gameplay, three endless levels and rocking 80's inspired graphics and soundtrack! Grab powerups and coins to clear the road and unlock all the cars!

name: Mad Truck Challenge
description:
Get ready to roll with Monster Trucks!
Gear up for roaring, action-packed race battles against the meanest Monster Trucks you’ve ever seen! They’re waiting for you at the Mad Truck Challenge starting line. Strap up for a relentless racing simulator that will have your adrenaline pumping. Select your truck, armed with rockets, and race against the toughest off-road drivers on the planet. Crush and blast your way to victory while you perform extreme stunts and make your opponents bite the dust to earn the coveted MTC trophy.

name: Moose Lost in the Woods
description: Moose Lost in the Woods is a cozy 3D platformer without a language barrier. Explore by running, leaping, bouncing, and splashing around in Swedish forest environments, whilst stuffing your backpack with goodies!

name: Anyu
description: A 3D third person narrative exploration game, set in a frozen wasteland where an ancient civilization fell. Centered around movement puzzles and dealing with environment mechanics.

name: Viking Heroes 4
description: Join the Viking heroes in a race against time to save the world from eternal darkness. As the sun and moon falter and Fenrir threatens to consume them, the Vikings must travel across realms to forge a magical chain that can capture him.

name: Base of War
description: Base of War is a next generation 4x RTS game.

name: Extreme Truck Parking Simulator Game
description: Ready for a Real extreme trucking Challenge?! Drive 3 huge new trucks around the realistic Truck Driving Test Courses. Learn to master these epic vehicles, including the unique Multi-Wheeler with 3 interesting steering modes to use, a specialized truck with a massively long Trailer and a Road Train Truck with two container trailers attached! Take on the Ultimate Trucker Driving Test Challenge today!

name: Rush 'Hower
description:
Jessie Trucker (aka J.T.) is the best at trucking. J.T. just wants to go home to Las Vegas with some Colorado love... But when J.T. runs into ski rush hour in the icy mountains of Colorado, putting on the brakes leads to Just Trouble!
How far can J.T. make it down the treacherous, never-ending windy roads of Eisenhower Pass without meeting a terrible end?

name: Diver Dogs
description:
The evil Rocktopi have petnapped hundreds of puppies and dragged them beneath the ocean. It's up to Sharkie and the diver dogs to rescue them in time!
From the makers of GoNinja and ShaqDown comes a new action racing game for your mobile device. Master the art of drift boosting and use your racing skills to rescue lost puppies from under the sea and bring them to safety!

name: Drive.RS
description:
Welcome to the Drive.RS public beta!

Huge, fun, without limits - the biggest, best, most realistic open world racing game on mobile.

name: Digital Chain
description:
Digital Chain is a short, mystery visual novel about 3 kids who explore a haunted school.

The game focuses on a supposed 'Haunted School' and an Incident that occurred there in the past. With your two friends, Shuhei and Hiromi, explore the Haunted School. Online there were claims of a ghost summoning ritual that allows you to speak with the dead using only your cellphones. They called this ritual, The Digital Chain.

name: RollerCoaster Tycoon 8 pack
description: RollerCoaster Tycoon 8 Pack is a compilation for the PC that features the games RollerCoaster Tycoon, Added Attractions, Loopy Landscapes, RollerCoaster Tycoon 2, Wacky Worlds, Time Twister, RollerCoaster Tycoon 3 and Wild!

name: Tournament Arkanoid
description:
Tournament Arkanoid is a sequel to the original Arkanoid, developed by Taito and published by Romstar in the United States in 1987.

The game has 32 stages with different arrangements of blocks, some of them are much more challenging than his prequel.

name: Zelda3: IQ Test - Revenge of the Einstein
description:
The final installment of the IQ series, The Revenge of the Einstein, includes some of the most difficult block puzzles ever created in a Zelda game. The already existing puzzles from the IQ and Conker, which were considered to be of a better design, were used in this game and remodeled to be even more difficult, yet some rare puzzles are brand new.

A very short hack with very difficult riddles, which will test the limits of your intellect, while still being beatable if you invest enough time into solving. The hack also has some “breathing rooms”, in which you don’t need to think much to proceed.

name: Zelda3: Cube
description:
Inspired by the movie cube, this hack was made as one giant dungeon, which has 10×10 Hyrule Magic rooms. Thus the entire game is one big dungeon, which you need to solve in one sitting and no deaths. Can you do it? Can you find the exit?

This is a short hack, which will sometimes force you to think hard before you will be able to progress, but for the most part is still on par with the difficulty of the original game, with hints when special tricks are needed to progress.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: Sin descripción

name: Winnie's Hole
description: Join Winnie the Pooh on a new adventure, from within! You play a virus in Winnie's body, capture cells to grow mutations and specialise your host. Refine his primitive form, adapt for survival, and do not let his friends contain you. They do not understand our gift... We must share it with them.

name: Personal Sam-Y
description: A SAM-Y of your very own.

name: Othello Shiyou yo
description: Othello Shiyou yo is an arcade version of Othello.

name: Quiz F1 1,2 Finish
description: A quiz game with an F1 racing theme.

name: Simply Purple
description:
This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

Warning: This level is very gaudy and all nonsense. Not to mention all those hard challenges and incredibly demanding gameplay. So play it on your own risk.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2010.

name: Rescue Hannah
description: This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

name: King Arthur Project
description:
This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2013.

name: No Man's Sky: Singularity
description: The new No Mans Sky update, Singularity, continues the narrative arc that began in the Interceptor update and will progress throughout this year. In this five-week long expedition, players investigate strange robots that are delivering cryptic clues across the galaxy, following a story tangled in AI corruption. Watch the trailer for a peek at what's coming to the adventure survival game this time around.

name: Memoryland Prelude
description: Trapped in a world of memories, you must retrace the past after a glitch in the simulation threw everything into chaos. Discover cards that can summon strange creatures and fight to unravel the mysteries of Memoryland. Memoryland Prelude is a dreamlike card based JRPG, and is the first chapter in the Memoryland series.

name: Top Gear: Drift Legends
description: Sin descripción

name: Terra Memoria
description: A shortage of magic crystals and the sudden awakening of ancient robots leads six new friends on an incredible investigation across Terra – a cozy and fantastic world that combines 3D and pixel art.

name: Forgotlings
description: Forgotlings is a breathtaking cinematic action-adventure set in a magical land of sentient forgotten objects.

name: Light Odyssey
description: You will journey to reclaim the light of a fallen world, and in the ruins of an ancient civilization you will confront the Colossus. Their power might be overwhelming but trust the fading light guide and restore you during this Light Odyssey.

name: Dwarf Delve
description: In this first-person extraction roguelite adventure, strap on your gloves, grab your Battlemallet, and explore randomly-generated mines as a new Delveling. Gather riches, avoid deadly hazards and try to make it out with your beard intact!

name: Toxic Crusaders
description: The Toxic Crusaders return for an all-new, all-action beat 'em up for one to four players! Grab your mop, tutu and attitude, and get ready to clean up the mean streets of Tromaville, one radioactive goon at a time!

name: Quest Master
description: Quest Master is a dungeon maker inspired by the classics that first made us love dungeon crawling. Unleash your imagination, alone or in local co-op, to make dungeons full of puzzles, traps and monsters. Upload them for others to explore and challenge yourself with other players’ creations.

name: A Bonnie Odyssey
description: An open world sci-fi adventure set in the Scottish wilds. A tale of a father and daughter separated by time. A Bonnie Odyssey is a retrofuturist puzzle mystery where you’ll explore an enigmatic abandoned island, unravel the secrets of your own past, and make odd little friends along the way.

name: Dark Deity II
description: Verroa is a peaceful continent on the brink of war as the Asverellian Empire seeks to expand - at your homeland’s expense. Command unlikely heroes, fight challenging turn-based battles, and watch hardship forge iron into steel. Dark Deity is back, bigger and better than before!

name: En Garde!: Student Project
description:
A swashbuckling adventure!
En Garde! is a swashbuckling action-adventure game set in 17th century's Spain. Play as Adalia de Volador, a noble & impetuous swordswoman! Your palace has been seized by a mysterious mastermind and his hoard of guards - you will have to defend your family's honor!

Fight with your rapier and acrobatic moves against numerous opponents, and use the environment to your advantage in an intuitive way (every object is interactive, from tables to chandeliers!). You can even use your sense of repartee to taunt your opponents. Combat is a spectacle and should be done with panache!

This En Garde! prototype features story-driven action in an open level (the Volador's Palace) for a total play time of about 30 minutes.

name: Grifford Academy
description: Grifford Academy is a story-rich, coming-of-age RPG set in a mystical book realm where your decisions shape the personalities of the characters. Engage in strategic turn-based combat as you set out to discover the secrets of Caldria.

name: Crashlands 2
description: Slap your way across a vibrant world where interstellar friendships are the key to your survival. Befriend eccentric aliens, craft bizarre weaponry, and stick it to the man in this sequel to the award-winning open world crafting RPG Crashlands.

name: Deck of Souls
description: Roguelite deck-building meets souls-like. Break out of an infinite loop to close the hell gates, turn enemies into cards, and build your own omnipotent Deck of Souls! Rolls included.

name: Lake: Season's Greetings
description: It's Christmas time, 1985. Thomas Weiss spends the final few days of the year as he's always been doing: delivering mail and celebrating Christmas with his friends and family in Providence Oaks. However, this holiday season turns out a quite a bit different than expected...

name: Bye Sweet Carole
description: Bye Sweet Carole is a horrific thriller game inspired by the greatest animation movies and created by Chris Darril. (Remothered series) Be ready to jump into the world of Corolla and meet the rabbits that has infested it.

name: Mine Sweeper
description: Mine Sweeper is two player game. Each player controls a boat that can place mines. The game plays like a typical light-cycle game such as Blockade. The boats leave continuous trails of mines behind. Players can only turn at 90 degree angles. To win a player must last longer than your opponent before hitting the borders of the screen or a solid line of mines (first person to hit something loses). The game is over when a player has six points.

name: A Void Hope
description: A Void Hope takes you on an atmospheric puzzle platforming adventure to find a cure for a collapsed city. Follow the story of a tormented couple as they try to decipher reality from nightmares and overcome the shadowy threats lurking in the dark.

name: Mo Shou Shi Jie: E Mo Lie Ren
description: This game follows the story of Illidan Stormrage, as he works his way from a Night Elf, to a Demon Hunter, and finally an actual Demon. Play out this campaign in 8 bit that takes Illidan throughout Azeroth, and the Outland. Enjoy!

name: Crypt Custodian
description: Crypt Custodian is a charming metroidvania about cleaning up the afterlife. Play as Pluto- a mischievous cat who has died, and is sentenced to be the afterworlds janitor... forever! Hang out with other doomed ghosts, battle beasts, and explore a vastly expansive landscape.

name: Grime: Tinge of Terror
description: Enjoy a New Game + mode featuring revamped enemies and bosses, endless progression, and a terrifying secret boss!

name: Dawn of the Monsters: Arcade Edition
description: This DLC adds Arcade Mode, new playable character Meteor Temujin, and more!

name: Echoes of You
description: Echoes of You is a point n click visual novel about leaving behind a loved one and remember them for life. Play as a Vivienne, a vampire, who decides to visit her girlfriend's house one last time.

name: Half-Doomed
description: It features almost of all the major enemies you've fought back in Black Mesa, including Headcrabs, Bullsquid, HECU grunts, all return to screw your day up!

name: Doomsday of UAC
description:
Doomsday of UAC (commonly known by its filename UAC_DEAD) is a single-level PWAD designed by Leo Martin Lim. As part of their 10 Years of Doom feature, Doomworld named it one of the ten best WADs of 1994.

One of the first ever fan-made Doom mods, UAC_DEAD features an attempt at creating realistic-looking vehicles and environments. It contains a replacement sky graphic, and uses careful flat and texture choices in places to simulate colored lighting. It also includes the first known instance of the self-referencing sectors trick, used to create invisible stairs.

name: Runaway Train
description:
Runaway Train is a single-level PWAD for Doom II and the ZDoom source port that was released in February 2001. It was designed by Nigel Rowand (Enjay) and uses the music track "Les Chants Magnétiques Part 2" by Jean-Michel Jarre, sequenced to MIDI.

Apart from a brief introductory scene at a train station, the entire map is set on a moving train which is on a collision course and going to crash in three minutes, giving the player limited time to get a key from one end of the train and return.

name: Void
description: Void is a single-level PWAD by Mike Watson (Cyb). It uses the music tracks "It's Night Forever" by DipA for the title screen, introduction scene, and victory screen, and "Exquisite" by Andreas Viklund through the playable part.

name: Symphony of War: Legends
description: Enter Tahnra, a land savaged by war. You, a fresh academy graduate with humble beginnings, will grow to lead a grand army against a corrupt adversary. Gather heroes, form bonds, and lead your force in turn-based battles. Make use of tactics, terrain, morale and more to bring peace to the land!

name: Cartel Tycoon: San Rafaela
description: San Rafaela is a vast new map featuring ferry routes, stunning landmarks, and an immersive storyline! The destiny of San Rafaela lies in your hands!

name: UmaNetto. Full Preved!
description: Russian point & click puzzle game, based on the animated series "UmaNetto", which is a parody of the Russian TV series "Not Be Born Beautiful" ("Не родись красивой"), a Russian version of the Colombian telenovela "Yo soy Betty, la fea" ("I am Betty, the Ugly one").

name: Myth
description: Myth is a puzzle horror multiplayer game that guarantees an intense and headache-inducing experience with friends. Why the headache, you ask? Well, let's just say the puzzles are so mind-bendingly hard, they should come with a complimentary bottle of aspirin!

name: Gunslinger Girl Volume III
description: Gunslinger Girl Volume III is an Adventure game, published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Heart Attack
description: A maze game in which you can ward off enemies by utilizing freezes, which freeze the enemies in place, and plugs, which act as a temporary barrier.

name: MookerzZ
description: Sin descripción

name: Rocket League: Season 11
description:
Perched high above the seaside, a group of drift cars in tuning mode wait for the signal. At the whistle, a chaotic descent begins, for a festival of tight skids on these perilous mountain roads. Below, cheers are heard: a delirious crowd admires its favorite pilots to boost to victory. This is what you should expect in Season 11.

We hope you are well, as the festivities will rage on throughout the season. Drift with the famous Nissan Silvia (S13), immerse yourself in a colorful Rocket Pass and celebrate the best soccar moments in the Estadio Vida arena.

So, ready to light the fire? Season 11 begins on June 7!

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Title Update 1
description: A hunter's work is never done. New threats emerge and your investigations into the Anomaly take a step forward in free Title Update 1.

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Title Update 2
description: The hunts are heating up in the Kingdom! Powerful new Rare and Subspecies descend upon the land, plus a twisted new form of Elder Dragon rises from the shadows in free Title Update 2.

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Title Update 3
description: Prepare to jump headfirst into the chaos with the brave denizens of Kamura and Elgado. Chaotic Gore Magala and two Risen Elder Dragons headline a host of additions coming in Sunbreak Free Title Update.

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Title Update 4
description: Born in a world of ice, the lord of the tundra returns to freeze all in its path once more. The Elder Dragon Velkhana , Risen Crimson Glow Valstrax, a host of endgame additions, and more arrive in Free Title Update 4.

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Title Update 5
description: The Looming Calamity, Amatsu, has set its gaze on Kamura Village. Experience the thrilling climax to the Monster Hunter Rise story with Free Title Update 5.

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Bonus Update
description: The Sunbreak story reaches its epic conclusion as you face off with the ancient elder dragon, Primordial Malzeno in the Bonus Update!

name: Dreamwater
description: A short, fragmented experience created in RPG maker for Domino Club's Dream Gallery Jam. Dreamwater provides the player with snippets of thoughts on the theme of liquid.

name: The Little Mermaid's Friend
description: There are two mermaids who want to decide who will be the best mermaid. Although they often fight, in the end they make up and their friendship is the most important thing.

name: One Piece Odyssey: Reunion of Memories
description: Come join the Straw Hats for a new and different way to experience One Piece Odyssey. One Piece Odyssey, Reunion of Memories is available in the Deluxe version of the game, and purchasable separately. Expansion content is available after players finish the main game. One Piece Odyssey is available for PlayStation4, PlayStation5, Xbox Series X|S and PC.

name: Madden NFL 24: Deluxe Edition
description: FieldSENSE : INCREASED CONTROL AND REALISM. More realistic character movement and smarter AI gives you control to play out your gameplay strategy with the confidence to dominate any opponent in Madden NFL 24.

name: Agriculture
description: Grow crops as fast as you can in a frantic take on classic farming sim mechanics!

name: New Lands 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Do Not Crash
description: Drive your car to avoid obstacles and cars chasing you. Crash the cars and collect coins to buy a new whip.

name: Mega Man 4 Voyage: Blue Version
description: Mega Man 4 Voyage: Blue Version is a rom hack for Mega Man 4, served as an alternative version to Mega Man 4 Voyage developed by MartsINY.

name: Arcade Archives: Bravoman
description: Here comes Bravoman, an agent of justice!

name: SwapStar
description: Make patterns to gain energy. Spend energy to do actions. Plan your actions carefully to destroy your opponent's grid before they do yours. Play as Swapster in Story Mode or as any of the 10 colorful cast of characters in Mission or Versus Mode.

name: Shadows of Duat
description: An old school survival horror set in Egypt. An indie game with the essence of the classics of the genre, with realistic graphics and immersive sound. A difficult and terrifying challenge only suitable for the bravest people. No one will hear your screams from inside the grave.

name: The Red Sun
description: A challenging 2-D platformer about exploring a ruined city, defeating robotic invaders, and discovering the truth behind the mysterious Red Sun.

name: Down Under
description: Experience a game like it was 1995!

name: Majoneko
description: A hard puzzle platformer of predicting trajectories and climbimg a giant castle!

name: Dungeon Rebound
description: Dungeon Rebound is the perfect blend of nostalgic arcade gameplay and immersive RPG elements, offering a fresh and exciting take on both genres. Are you ready to rebound your way to victory and become a legend in the realm of Dungeon Rebound?

name: Call of Zombie
description: Call of Zombie is a survival shooting game set in the World War II era. As waves of zombies approach, your task is to protect the armory. By skillfully utilizing the remains of zombies, you can achieve unexpected effects and outcomes.

name: Nanuk: The dusk of the brutes
description: An incredible 2d platform game, of a hero from the cave age, fighting against great enemies to free his people from a spell and rescue his beloved.

name: RichMan 4 Fun
description: In the world of property, rely on your luck and decision-making becoming a tycoon!

name: Talk to Strangers
description: Sin descripción

name: Forklift Extreme: Ultra Edition
description:
Get ready to rev your engines and stack your way to glory in Forklift Extreme simulator!
This hyper-realistic forklift game puts you in the driver's seat, with highly-detailed physics that mimic the movement and handling of real forklifts. Master a variety of forklifts with unique handling characteristics, and tackle a wide range of tasks and challenges.

name: Forklift Extreme: Ultra DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Zotto suru Kowai Toshi Densetsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Battle Sensha
description: Sin descripción

name: Aiten Eishi: Blue Guardians
description: Sin descripción

name: Chokotto Study Mijika na Kotoba
description: Sin descripción

name: Delia: The Traveling Witch
description: Delia and her glowing pig Bao are now in Glutinous Kingdom. After receiving a request to cure a sick child, they are wrapped in an adventure that spans the whole magical land!

name: 100 Doors Game: Dasshutsu Game
description: A room escape adventure developed by Peaksel.

name: Cave of Past Sorrows
description: Rush straight into the action. Embrace the fast-paced bullet hell, hidden within the Cave of Past Sorrows. Watch your past, present, and future collide in a surreal spectacle.

name: Ghost Files: Mienai Hannin wo Sagase
description: Sin descripción

name: Carrom Slam!
description: Can you achieve the legendary Slam! by pocketing all your pieces in one turn? Strike, pocket, and dominate in this authentic Carrom experience! Team up with friends or join players online. Experience Pro, Points, Disc Pool, Blitz, and Training modes. Carrom Slam!

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: Challengers Pack
description: Challengers Pack adds 5 brand new cars to the main game. The Audi R8 LMS GT3 EVO II, BMW M2 CS Racing, Ferrari 488 GT3 Challenge Evo, Lamborghini Huracan Super Trofeo EVO 2, Porsche 911 GT3 Cup (Type 992)

name: Dakar Desert Rally: SnowRunner Trucks
description: Sin descripción

name: Kubes
description: Can you lead the kubes to safety? Are you fast enough to control them all?

name: Hungry Pets
description:
Meet Aphelia Ellis, an aspiring entrepreneur trying to startup her pet care business!
Join her in this unique physics puzzle game that will challenge your logic / problem solving skills and perhaps learn something along the way in terms of what it takes to manage a pet care business!

name: Coffee Golf
description:
A small daily golf game to go with your morning coffee.
A new course every day. Sink the five holes in any order, using the fewest strokes possible. Share your flawless score with friends as you try to forget about all the lily pads you left in the water.

name: Dream Town Island
description:
Give free reign to your creativity in this inventive town sim!
Unlock new stores and facilities, help your residents find love, or cash in on the stock market!
If you founded a new town on an uninhabited island, what would you build there? Restaurants? Convenience Stores? Movie theaters? Make your choices and create a town that everyone will want to move to!

name: Moonlight Drive
description:
Immerse yourself in a night ride with super jet cars through a city of the future in Moonlight Drive.
Enjoy the jet car driving thrill in one of the best 3D flying car games and prove that you can fly drive through heavy traffic full of flying vehicles.

name: 10Cube
description: An addictive three-dimensional remove block. With 10 grids, beautiful skins for cubes, new features, and amazingly designed user interface, the game is an unique combination of Level challenges and Endless mode puzzle which will bring an impressive experience for the players.

name: Simply Ludo
description: Ludo is a simple board game for two to four players. In the game, the players race their four tokens from start to finish according to dice rolls.

name: Funny Circus 2
description: The fun continuous in the Funny Circus 2, With More games and Places. Check out 4 different locations. have fun outside in the yard, jungle,Pipo´s house and the north Pole.

name: Ninja Go!!
description:
Began training hard to become the strongest ninja.
Is a prerequisite for speed and agility of a ninja.
You need to be hard and difficult for novice ninja ultimate ninja force you.
Ultimate ninja way depends on your hands.

name: Marlo: Merlin's Halls
description:
Help Marlo to save the princess captured by the evil Merlin.
Tap your way through Merlin's evil minions, defeat Merlin and save the princess!

name: Glorkian Warrior
description: In Glorkian Warrior, you play as a cadet out to prove his worth and maybe get a promotion or two. Your trusty Super Backpack will help you fend off the incoming attackers by firing a constant stream of lasers into the sky. Grab power-ups dropped by the enemies to gain temporary access to some Glorkin' good weapons. And if anything is too low to shoot, leap over it! It's good, classic shoot-em-up fun.

name: Smash Mania
description:
Hack, hackle, cut, break, explode, SMASH everything in sight – in Smash Mania total destruction will be your aim!
Destroy various barriers and crash all on your way, using different weapons. Juicy fruits and expensive wines mustn’t stay on the shelves, smash them as soon as possible. Act like a shot in changeable game situations!

name: Tower Brawl
description: Tower Brawl is a casual and competitive game that combines elements of tower defense, real-time strategy and card genres.Instead of the usual tower defense games, Tower Brawl features an original siege theme and a variety of personality-filled heroes with synergies and counters between their abilities and classes. Featured an original siege theme and tons of colorful heroes which belong to different classes, crushing enemies through synergy. Tower Brawl promotes an environment full of variables with random card draws in the battle to keep you and your opponent on your toes! In this exciting game, players will enjoy a powerful balance between strategy and randomness.

name: Pokémon Tectonic
description: Explore the Makya region, where old and new collide. Host to dozens of ancient caves and tunnels, Makya was settled anew by the disbanded members of Team Chasm, who 20 years ago sought the power of the Regis. When a strange new group puts those plans back into motion, the people of Makya need a newcomer like yourself to delve deep and find the truth.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 44 - The Sins of Black Adam
description: Sin descripción

name: Where’s My Water? The Mystery Duck’s Story
description: The Mystery Duck's Story is an optional In-App Purchase that puts a magical twist on Swampy's Story. The regular Swampy Ducks are replaced with the teleporting and levitating Mystery Duck, or the water consuming Mega Duck, or a crew of ducklings.

name: Where’s My Water? Cranky’s Story
description: Cranky's Story is an optional In-App Purchase that has four chapters and eight challenge sets. In this story, the player helps Cranky clean Algae off his food. Cranky is the sewer's most hungry Alligator. Cranky is relying on an old pipe that puts out Poison Water to clean away the Algae.

name: Where’s My Water? Allie’s Story
description: Allie's Story is an optional In-App Purchase that has four chapter and challenges. In this story, the player must help Allie with her broken organ. Allie is the sewer's most creative and talented alligator. Unfortunately, the Other alligators have broken the steam pipe line to her Piano.

name: Night Terrors
description: Experience a chilling adventure unlike any other! Join Kenny on a journey to conquer his night terrors and discover the ultimate solution. Kenny's parents, desperate for a remedy, have sought the help of a renowned doctor who offers an experimental drug to banish these haunting nightmares for good.

name: Cross Tails
description: What will the tails witness after a crossing tale? A tactical RPG that portrays a fantasy story of a war between the canine and the feline tribes playable from both points of view.

name: Crypt Lord
description: A fantasy RPG designed to give you a quick dose of dungeon crawling adventure. Find ancient runes to augment your equipment, allowing you to mix & match magical effects. Delve deep into dungeons, find enemies, gather loot, and offer sacrifice to your ancestors to increase your strength.

name: Club Suicide: Complete Edition
description: Club Suicide: Complete Edition is a remastered version of the anti-romanticism otome game with fully remastered visuals and a completely remade BGM with newly added pieces, an additional scenario for each route, a completely new route, and two additional endings.

name: Touche Me
description: Touche Me is an unlicensed adult maze game based on Who Censored Roger Rabbit.

name: Heavenscape
description: Heavenscape is a 3D horror roguelike meant to invoke PC Games from the early 2000s. You play as a character named ANGEL, who is an angel traveling home from a party at night. Find a path home, meet friends and avoid dangers. Be careful - if your phone's battery runs out, its over...

name: Tactical Vengeance: Play The Games
description:
Step into the heart-pounding realm of non-stop action with our dynamic shooting game, meticulously crafted and continually evolving to deliver an unparalleled gaming experience. Immerse yourself in the thrill of a game that is refined and enhanced every day, ensuring each playthrough is an adrenaline-fueled journey of excitement and intensity.

Our commitment to excellence drives us to push the boundaries of gaming, constantly introducing new challenges, features, and optimizations. Brace yourself for an ever-improving adventure, where every shot fired, every move made, and every strategy employed contributes to an evolving masterpiece of interactive entertainment.

Engage in an immersive world where skill, strategy, and reflexes collide in a symphony of high-octane action. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a newcomer to the world of virtual combat, our shooting game promises an exhilarating experience that keeps you on the edge of your seat.

Join our community of intense shooter action game enthusiasts and witness firsthand the dynamic evolution of a game that refuses to settle for anything less than excellence. Are you ready to embark on a thrilling journey where each day brings new challenges and triumphs? The battlefield awaits, and the action is just getting started. Dive into the excitement – this is gaming at its finest.

name: Vaudeville
description:
Vaudeville is a detective game in which the player plays the role of Detective Martini, a private detective who has come to the city of Vaudeville to solve the mystery of the murders of three people.

Vaudeville is an experimental whodunit game based on the latest AI technologies.
A tale of murder, suspense and absurdity that unfolds as you play, and you are the protagonist.

name: Mullet Madjack
description: Mullet Madjack is a single-player fast-paced FPS that brings you directly inside a classic anime. Power up your character and reach the last floor; Beat your best time or try again. Haste makes waste… of your enemies!

name: Carrot Cake Jinkaku Shuffle Jiken
description:
The Fata Morgana no Yakata's whole gang is gathered for a last tea party around a carrot cake. The cake is so delicious that, to everybody displeasure, their souls got shuffled!
Let's begin the Carrot Cake Soul-Shuffling Incident!

2015 April Fools' game by Novectacle.

name: PebbleDash
description: Race online as pebbles in this blazing non-stop, unpredictable multiplayer platformer! From drunk mode, to golfing; no match is like the last! But why are the pebbles racing? Find out in a short, yet vivid story mode, featuring a rich and luminous cast of characters with charming dialogue.

name: Touhou Fugyouseki: Nightmare of Sleeping Girl
description: Touhou Fugyouseki ~ Nightmare of Sleeping Girl is an SRPG released by Kamo, based upon AliceSoft's Widenyo.

name: Gino il Pollo - Perso Nella Rete
description: "Gino il Pollo - Perso Nella Rete" is an adventure video game that follows the escapades of Gino, the renowned singing chicken of the internet. In this captivating journey, Gino is kidnapped by the enigmatic character Colby and faces the dire threat of being forever trapped within the depths of the Internet. The success of Colby's experiment would lead to the same fate for humanity.

name: Lost Caves
description:
You control the famous explorer, armed only with his trusty shovel. You must collect ten diamonds in each of the sixteen mines. Once these gems have been collected you must find the wooden door which leads to the next cavern.
Your explorer can clear the soft earth using his shovel, however the Nomads who have followed him into the mines are unable to do this. The explorer may also push boulders which will kill Nomads and detonate bombs, on contact.

name: Richard Benson
description: A game about Richard Benson.

name: Super Epic Random Bard Guy
description: Sin descripción

name: Call of Dooty
description: Call of Dooty is a remake of the classic E1M1: Hangar level, parodying contemporary first-person shooters with their features like linear level design, disrupting cutscenes, and regenerating health.

name: Call of Dooty II: Green Ops
description: Call of Dooty II: Green Ops is a five-level jokewad for Doom II and the GZDoom source port by Matthew Christian (Chubzdoomer). It was released on November 13, 2012, and received the Mockaward at that year's Cacowards.

name: Call of Dooty III: Spectres
description: If you've already seen and/or played the first two parts, you'll know exactly what to expect from the third.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Season 04
description:
Al Mazrah, Urzikstan, Ashika Island, Las Almas . . . and now, Vondel.
The waterfront district of a Baroque European city where centuries of old-world history blends with modern architectural developments, Vondel saw a complete evacuation due to an imminent attack threat, right as Operators descended into the darkness of the Al Mazrah Koschei Complex during a fierce sandstorm at the culmination of Season 03.
While Vondel is a brand-new locale for Operators to explore, the ensuing chaos is part of a plan activated by a familiar and infamous masked figure, whose forces are operating in both Al Mazrah and Vondel. Peer through the dust clouds, and you’ll recognize the apparent leader of these unknown forces:
His name is Nikto. And he’s ready to Run This Town.

name: SimpleTD
description: A Simple Tower Defence Game. Build, Loot, Buy & Sell, Level Up, Quest... Controllable Difficulty, Custom Gameplay, Ingame Help.

name: Shimazu
description: Shimazu is a side-scrolling action/dark art style game. Take on the role of a samurai named Shimazu, who's son is kidnapped and his wife is killed by an evil demon called Takeda with help from another demon called Fudo.

name: Wild West Pistolero
description: In this arcade-inspired indie title you take on the role of bounty hunter Jules! Hunt legendary bandits of the Wild West, shoot your way through hordes of criminals, ride across the prairie and, of course, collect lots of money!

name: Obama Boss Fight: Bad Trip
description: Obama has no chill. He has returned and you have to embark on an adventure to stop him. Everything depends on you again. There is no turning back. It's all or nothing.

name: Wabbalidu
description: An experimental rhythm based highscore game in which you wander through a hypnotizing world. Created around the theme of "anticipation".

name: Ruins Story
description: High-speed movement, aiming, and shooting with one finger operation! High tempo battle! Use unlocked items to come up with new builds and strategies each time you explore.

name: Bugby
description: Bugby is a 3v3 team sport set in a magical forest. Each team tries to score the most points by carrying the Bugby ball into one of the many goals scattered about. Use the bouncy mushrooms, pits and platforms to traverse across the playground-like arena.

name: Anti-Guide to Field Guides
description: A bitsy game about creating a field guide from plants that you discover in the forest.

name: Grand Tour
description: A puzzle game similar to Tetris.

name: Stellar Transports
description:
Logistics company Stellar Transports is in financial ruins! In this puzzle platformer you help the happy-go-lucky alien Gadwok move crates from the company hangar onto incoming space trucks.

Fill the daily quota to keep the company from going bankrupt! The crates have various shapes and properties making it a challenging task.

Some crates bounce, some float in mid air and others turn invisible when you look directly at them. Most challenging of all - time is running out, all the time!

How you fill the quota is up to you, as long as the crates end up in the right zones on the ship you get paid. Will you stack carefully to optimize the space or go wild and throw crates hoping at least some will end up where they should?

The most important part is that you have fun doing it!

name: Aim Shooter Game
description: AIM shooter game is good game to practise aim before playing main fps shooters.

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown
description:
Dash into a stylish and thrilling action-adventure platformer set in a mythological Persian world where the boundaries of time and space are yours to manipulate.
Play as Sargon and evolve from sword-wielding prodigy to extraordinary legend as you master acrobatic combat and unlock new Time Powers and unique super abilities.

name: Dead by Daylight: Nicolas Cage
description: Prepare for a tour de force performance. Dead by Daylight's Nicolas Cage Chapter Pack features a new Survivor, legendary actor Nicolas Cage in his deadliest role yet. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive Cosmetic: Teal Jacket as well as the Very Rare Gorgon Drip outfit for Nicolas Cage.

name: Sonic Superstars
description: Adventure through the mystical Northstar Islands in this all-new take on classic 2D Sonic high-speed action platforming. Play as Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, and Amy Rose and harness all-new Emerald powers to move and attack in dynamic new ways. Navigate gorgeous, never-before-seen environments solo or with up to 3 other players and stop Dr. Eggman, Fang, and a mysterious new adversary from converting the islands' giant animals into Badniks before it's too late!

name: Sand Land
description: Sand Land is an action RPG where you become the main character as Beelzebub, a Fiend Prince. Lead your company of heroic misfits and explore the legendary world of Sand Land developed by the creator of Dragon Ball & Dr. Slump, Akira Toriyama.

name: Yes, Your Grace: Snowfall
description: In this new reality, where monsters seem closer, enemies stronger and your petitioners struggling more than ever, your duties as a King must continue. It will be your responsibility to rebuild the trust of your kingdom, protect your family and survive the upcoming winter.

name: John Carpenter's Toxic Commando
description: Take control of one of the commandos, team up with your friends and send the Sludge God and its horde of things-that-should-never-be back to the underworld. Choose the class that matches your playstyle, pile into your favorite ride, and unload an array of gunfire, grenades, special abilities, and freaking katanas as you save the planet.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 4 - Season 3: Wilds
description: Find out what Fortnite Wilds is all about when a squad uncovers what's beneath the crumbling terrain. Danger is afoot, but so is adventure! Be on the lookout for mud, raptors, and vines as these will all play a key part in navigating WILDS. Plus, an Autobot bestows his likeness upon the Island.

name: Nexus 5X
description: Stellaris Nexus is a turn-based multiplayer 4X game that respects your time, giving you the full spectrum of a thrilling, strategic 4X experience. Play as unique factions and leaders against up to 5 other players, plotting and battling your way to galactic dominance; all of it in about an hour.

name: Star Trek: Infinite
description: Star Trek: Infinite is a grand strategy experience that lets you play your own Star Trek story as the leader of one of four major factions in the galaxy. Follow the specially crafted story or blaze your own trail in the first Star Trek grand strategy game.

name: Lysfanga: The Time Shift Warrior
description: Your Kingdom’s fate relies on you… you… and you. Rewind time to create clones of your past-selves, and fight with an army of your own. Become legion and triumph over hordes of monsters to rescue Antala in this Hack'N'Slash game with a tactical twist.

name: Beastieball
description: Coach a sports team of Beasties in this turn-based volleyball RPG! Your Beasties' relationships power up their teamwork!

name: Simpler Times
description: Simpler Times is an experiential, interactive meditation that rewards patience and attention with poignant moments that can be replayed like a favorite song.

name: Remnant II: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- The game
- Early Access to 3 sets: (Elder Armor, Radiant Armor, and Void Armor)

name: Remnant II: Ultimate Edition
description: Remnant II pits survivors of humanity against new deadly creatures and god-like bosses across terrifying worlds. Play solo or co-op with two other friends to explore the depths of the unknown to stop an evil from destroying reality itself.

name: Cart Life
description: An expanded game of Cart Life (2010) which shares the same name with the originally released game.

name: Helskate
description: Helskate is a skateboarding action roguelite. Grind, perform tricks, and chain combos to power up your attacks to slay the monsters of Vertheim. Combine unique weapons and gear to suit your playstyle as you fight, die, and upgrade your abilities to come back to this labyrinth over and over again!

name: Summerhill
description: Summerhill is a story-driven puzzle game in which you play as a young shepherd and their dog. Journey across an ancient, pastoral landscape to reunite your scattered flock, and unearth the mysteries of a long-forgotten past.

name: Saltsea Chronicles
description: It begins with a kidnapped captain and a stolen ship. Where it leads next? That’s up to you… In this story-driven adventure game you will explore strange and wonderful communities, uncover a deep conspiracy, and chart a journey through twists and turns, difficulties and delights.

name: WRC: FIA World Rally Championship - The Official Game
description: Drive all the cars and compete against all the drivers of the 2014 FIA World Rally Championship!

name: Shadows of the Damned: Hella Remastered
description: Shadows of the Damned, an action-adventure road trip through hell, has been remastered at last! Get ready for a story about rock, love, and just a little bit of demon slaying.

name: Baby Steps
description: Play as Nate, an unemployed failson with nothing going for him, until one day he discovers a power he never knew he had… putting one foot in front of the other. Explore a world shrouded in mist, one step at a time. Hike the serene mountains by placing each footstep yourself, in original physics-based gameplay from the minds behind Ape Out and Getting Over It. Take in the sights, fall in love with the local fauna, and try to find meaning in a wasted life.

name: Human Fall Flat 2
description: Team up and let your creativity run wild in Human Fall Flat 2, the outrageous new sequel to the much-loved capers of everyone’s favourite physics-based human friends.

name: Hatsune Miku: The Planet of Wonder and Fragments of Wishes
description: Miku and friends crash land on a mysterious planet during their space journey... There they meet many unique characters! Play all kinds of games to grant everybody's wishes! Contains nine minigames including the previously released Amiguru Jump and Amiguru Train.

name: Kidnapped
description: Solve the mysterious kidnapping of beloved actress Sebastiana Sax. In this one-player mystery game, you must decipher clues and interrogate witnesses to get to the bottom of this heinous crime. Can you solve the mystery in time?

name: Sands of Salzaar: The Ember Saga
description: This DLC contains 3 content expansions: "Ember Workshop", "Child Rearing" and "Among Legends: Xin Qi Ji", and they can be independently loaded/removed in the game.

name: Tank and Roll
description: Tank And Roll is an Action-Shooter game that challenges players achieve the highest score! There are features such as unlocking new vehicles, drawing your own vehicle, and importing custom avatars for your character! It offers both fun and a rewarding challenge for those who dare to master it!

name: Tentacle Prawn: (Actually) A Cthulhu Dating Sim - Huge Manatees
description: Adds two new pages of classes to attend.

name: The Hermit Chronicles
description: The Hermit Chronicles is a 1st-person survival horror game set in a deep forest. Assuming the role of a hermit, you will have to get food, scout your neighborhood, and search for resources to make gear. But after the sun goes down, you'll have to survive for real...

name: Zombiepede
description: Upgrade your weapons in this defense shooter to shoot your way alone or with up to 4 friends in couch coop through endless hordes of different creatures and missions.

name: Warlock's Gantlet
description:
Warlock's Gantlet is a sword & sorcery themed, first person, open world, action-RPG with "Indiana Jones-style" puzzles (find and use clues such as maps, notes, drawings etc. to solve environmental mysteries).

You play as a warlock-in-training who has been tasked by their masters to retrieve a valuable item that was stolen from them. They have decided that this opportunity shall serve as a test of your general aptitude and your continued study with them depends on your success.

name: TV Head: Eight Pages
description: You find yourself all alone in the middle of a dark forest. You have no weapons and no place to wait for help. The dim flashlight that lights the way is your only friend. Your goal is to explore the location to find eight pages and leave this frightening place.

name: Towerspell
description: Scrabble meets Plants Vs. Zombies! Spell words to summon monsters or cast spells in a tactically deep battle system. Fight through 50+ handmade levels in the story mode, battle your friends in online 1-on-1 PvP matches, or create and share your own levels.

name: Cow Girls 3 Stories
description: Only the greenest meadows, only the cleanest ponds, and only the most fragrant flowers on our farm! Any girl cow will feel great here! This means that they will be gentle and give lots of milk!

name: DCS World: Sinai Map
description: The DCS: Sinai map is focused on the Sinai Peninsula, located between the Gulf of Suez and the Gulf of Aqaba with eastern Egypt to the west and southern Israel to the east. Since ancient times, it has been a strategic location rich in resources, nature, religion, and history.

name: Dungeon and Craft
description: In this adventure with a total of 6 weapons, you will produce your own weapons and turn the mushrooms you collect from the forest into pots that you can sell. In the dungeons, you will fight against challenging creatures for 16 waves and improve your character.

name: Dungeon Mutation
description: Warriors trapped in the dungeon, challenging the constantly changing environment of the dungeon

name: Roots Need Control 3.0: Roots Need Chungnam 8.7
description: Protect the root flower. Something unexpected happens. Here in Chungcheongnam-do.

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws: Native American
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - Whirlwind️
description: Storm Alert! Blow away the highest scores on Williams Pinball: Whirlwind️ while battling the elements and capturing the wonders of our powerful nature.

name: Pinball FX: Honor and Legacy
description: Fight for Honor and cement your Legacy on these timeless Zen Originals! Seek vengeance in feudal Japan or relive the adventures of one of the best-selling novels of Jules Verne.

name: Furries & Scalies: Super Scary Halloween Spooky Times - Final Boss
description: Adds a new customer and a new mechanic.

name: Grapplania
description: Join Lynn, a descendant of a long line of whip-wielding warriors, in a 2D adventure through a perilous, abandoned castle filled with treasure.

name: Hexceed: Terra Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Terra Puzzle your way through 137 new levels - levels include all previously introduced mechanics!

name: Math Ascension
description: Master multiplication by competing in math races against the gladiators of the Calculuseum, unlocking and combining different powers to cross the finish line before your opponent. Math Ascension adapts to all levels, and was designed to help boost players' confidence in math.

name: Mediterranea Inferno
description: Explore the inner demons of three childhood friends on a summer retreat. Unearth secrets, fears and obsessions as you help them reconnect and rediscover themselves. A mature and treacherous visual novel from the creator of Milky Way Prince - The Vampire Star.

name: Tomb Raider: The Tower Bridge Experience
description:
This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the TombEngine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This level started as a training ground and experimental ground for the author to get back into level building, and push the new TombEngine to its limits. As part of Matrix54's Revival Challenge he decided to pay homage to the late Dhama's Tower Bridge levels created in 2001. As a test he attempted to create Tower Bridge in Tomb Raider with its proper dimensions, a feat wouldn't be possible before TEN (TombEngine). And it just grew from there!

name: Dismember Mind 3
description:
The police have arrested Zoe for the murder of the couple who sold her to the Villa where she was all her childhood, now 4 years locked in a prison to experiment with people that society has rejected, something clouds Zoe's mind, feelings and pain, thanks to that he is able to survive this torment.

Here the argument arch of zoe closes.

name: Lara Croft: The Last Plague
description: This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

name: Magi's Dream
description: Enter the Magi's Dream. Survive endless waves of enemies while getting stronger by using the arcane powers of the Magi! Push your creative limits in this pixel art reverse bullet-hell. How long can you survive the dream?

name: Kazu Adventures
description: Turn-based combat with timed counters. Defeat countless stages of enemies by using your reflexes to counter their attacks and deal massive damage.

name: Chex Quest 4: Flemmed to The Core
description: A modification of Chex Quest 3 that adds a new episode.

name: Onto Maizilind Unto Infinity: Act I - Destruction's Wake
description: Onto Maizilind Unto Infinity is a 3 act game about the end of human civilization and the torment that consumes humanity on the other side of our long-awaited apocalypse.

name: Endless Days II
description:
After some lighthouse keepers mysteriously disappear, Matthews, a police detective, goes to the island to investigate and find out what's going on.

He agrees to look after the lighthouse for six months while he investigates the island... But something terrible is about to unfold...

name: Bloody Woman
description: A young man accepts a job in a laundry in the late hours. But he discovers that something terrible has happened there and his life is in danger.

name: Midnight Tales Vol.3: Christmas
description: In the middle of Christmas, a man tells some horror stories to his daughter... but something is very wrong...

name: The Elevator
description:
Josh has been working a hotel front desk for a week on the night shift.

After realizing that in the elevator of the place there is a mystery... he begins to investigate to find out what is happening.

name: Fragrance Point
description: What went wrong on Fragrance Point? Explore, hang out, and poke around where you're not supposed to.

name: You Are Not a Banana: Better Edition
description: You Are Not a Banana is set in everyday life and has a sprinkle of imagination and humor. The audiovisuals seek to evoke nostalgia for the 80s and 90s. This short form experimental game unfolds as a sequence of thought provoking events and surprises. This game also comes with a free catchy chiptune soundtrack.

name: Don Orlo's Magazine: Issue #1
description: Sin descripción

name: Crash Team Rumble: Season 1
description: Launch was the first season in Crash Team Rumble, it began on the 20th of June 2023 and ended on the 11th of September 2023.

name: Undershadows
description: Welcome to Undershadows. In this point and click RPG you control a child who has been robbed of his soul and being dragged into a dark world.

name: 60FPS Kitten
description:
60FPS Kitten is a difficult patience-action game where you're a kitten that moves at 60FPS!

How far can you get before you give up in despair?

name: ZoroMe
description:
ZoroMe is a 3D-puzzle game with dice that challenges to the limits of the player’s mind!
Experience rich content with simple gameplay. A rainbow die will help you get astronomical scores! Compete with players from across the world for a higher score!

name: Vengeance RPG
description: Vengeance is a single-player RPG in which you can immerse yourself in a story accompanied by beautiful music and atmosphere. Your journey will be rewarded with legendary and mythical items.

name: Tap Space: Reaction and Focus Training
description: There are 2/3 lanes on the game screen, and spaceship on those lanes. Those spaceships headed to another planet, and obstacles waiting on their way, so you have to help them to avoid those obstacles. It can be asteroids, space mines, even UFOs. To avoid the obstacles you need to tap the lane your spaceship on, and it will move from side to side.

name: Rocket Chimp
description:
Ham the chimp is about to embark on his first out-of-this-world adventure!
Control Ham's rocket ship using the accelerometer to avoid asteroids, comets, satellites and other space junk! Use your shield to blast through if you get into a bind!
But don't forget to collect fuel canisters or you'll be parachuting back to Earth.

name: Repeat: A Memory Game
description: Watch the tiles. Repeat the sequence. Focus your mind.

name: Real Driving Simulator 23
description: Do you love cars? Real Driving Simulator is the best driving simulator that features more than 100 vehicles and a huge open-world map to explore. A big selection of vehicles is waiting for you: sedans, supercars, off roaders, SUVs and more, with realistic engine sounds and accurate interiors! Drive across Europe, complete many challenges like track racing, drag racing, consumption challenge, high speed driving, no damage challenge and many more! Compete with your friends in the Online Multiplayer mode!

name: Puzzle 26: The 7th Day
description:
The developer of Doodle Kart announces Puzzle “26”, a puzzle solving game unlike any games that you’ve ever played. Looking for something challenging but also entertaining for your day? Puzzle “26” is the perfect App providing dozens of hours of fun for you. The game is inspired from the traditional game: Minesweeper. However, Puzzle “26” is much more challenging. All the puzzles include 4 different symbols instead of mines. The game rule is so simple that you just need to put the right Egyptian symbols into the right boxes according to the hints.
The game is easy at the beginning, but it becomes harder and harder at the higher levels. The last 20 puzzles are specially designed for genius. If you’re a puzzle lover, this game is definitely your choice.

name: Real Moto
description:
Experience the top tier mobile motorbike racing! Surpass maximum speed around the circuit. Let the speed awaken your instincts and experience the real motorbike racing!
Ride the best Super Motorbikes and experience the racing adrenaline. Campaign mode’s difficulty varies depending on the tracks. Break the world records with your skills!

name: Power Rangers: Unite
description:
Unite rangers, zords, weapons and villains from all 22 epic seasons of Power Rangers!
Power Rangers: Unite is the official collectible card game of the Power Rangers!
An all-new story brings together Power Rangers from all seasons, fighting to save Earth from the villain NeroDark. Only teamwork, loyalty and friendship can win this battle!

name: Podageddon
description: Soon there will be a revolution, Mass transportation has hit the skies. "Pods" have taken over as the top mode of transport. The car is dead. Illegal racing is popular, and fatalities have soared. Fed up with these activities, authorities have run Pod racers out of town. They have taken to the deserts and oceans. This arrangement has been working well, but a disturbing and deadly new sport is emerging.

name: Ping Pong 3D HD
description: Play the ultimate classic game in amazing 3d graphics. Play through 4 unique levels with 3 difficulty settings. Use your finger or accelerometer to control your bat and defeat the opponent. 4 unique levels including Arctic, Space, Machine, Egyptian and a hidden level.

name: Petrolhead Paradise
description: Welcome to Petrolhead Paradise, the digital playground for all car lovers around the world! Are you ready to sit behind the wheel of many different iconic cars and earn in-game money by speeding and drifting across over 25 environments, even across endless highway roads? Test your skills in over 60 difficult career challenges consisting of Time Attack, Autocross and Drift events. Show off your driving skills in order to unlock many amazing cars and mods and also play with your friends in an online free roam multiplayer mode or compete with them in multiplayer drag races!

name: Next: Merger with Power of 2
description:
Swipe (Left, Right, Up, Down) to move blocks on the field and merge tiles. The field moves until reaching the Left/Right/Up/Down wall.
Plan your moves using the next tile, earn points and reach the highest level during one play.

name: Legacy 4: Tomb of Secrets
description:
This game is designed to immerse you in a world of mystery and intrigue, with stunning 3D graphics and physics-based puzzles that will challenge even the most experienced players.
Step into the shoes of a young archaeologist and explore the hidden secrets of an ancient tomb. With an immersive point-and-click interface, you'll be able to interact with your surroundings in a way that feels natural and intuitive. Each room in the tomb presents a new challenge, with puzzles that will test your intelligence, creativity, and problem-solving skills.
