But be warned, the tomb is full of surprises, and someone may be watching your every move. Keep an escape plan in mind at all times, and use your wits and instincts to uncover the truth behind the tomb's mysterious past.
As you progress through the game, you'll uncover clues and collect items that will help you piece together the tomb's history and the people who built it. Use your touch controls to inspect objects and take photos of anything that catches your eye, and immerse yourself in the world of the ancient tomb.
What sets Legacy 4 apart from other puzzle games is its innovative hint system. If you find yourself stuck on a puzzle, don't worry. The game's built-in hint system will guide you through the most challenging puzzles, ensuring that you never get stuck for long. And with a range of difficulty levels to choose from, you can customize your experience to match your skill level and preferences.

name: Battle Recruits
description: Battle Recruits is a fun, fast-paced 'Snake'-like Tower Attack game, where you can choose to play as one of many unique Heroes, all with specialized abilities! Gather your troops on the battlefield while avoiding the dangerous obstacles, then unleash them in order to destroy the enemy castle!

name: California Waves
description: Amped to surf the biggest waves? Ride the tube like never before, no ankle busters here!

name: Chicco App Toys Blocks
description: Look how easy it is to build objects and colourful characters with simple clicks. Choose the right blocks and complete the figures. The game does not end here. The app really does interact with the Chicco constructions. Frame the special bricks and discover the magic from your tablet.

name: I Love Pasta
description:
We invite you to I Love Pasta! Order social dishes from the beautiful 2nd floor terrace. The more you play, the more special bonuses there is for you to enjoy!

Produce various ingredients all over the world, and make new menus at your restaurant! When you complete a new menu, you will find landmark items for decorating the distinctive market towns of each country or new patrons will visit your restaurants.

name: Hidden Object: Los Angeles Detective Gold
description: Hidden Object Los Angeles Detective Absolutely free and intriguing game in the style of "I find" and "Hidden Object"! The detective in Los Angeles is an exciting and interesting story. Find all the hidden objects to solve the crime in Los Angeles.

name: Got Got
description: The cops are chasing you. Don't Get Got. Smash into the traffic to score extra points. Avoid the police, SWAT, helicopters, and road blocks. Race around the city streets avoiding the cops and completing the mini-missions.

name: Go Go Fast
description: Put your reflexes to the test as you make deliveries, pick up passengers, save lives, play as a goat, and so much more in this quirky endless runner!

name: GoFish: Avoid the Dams
description: Tap and hold to swim fast and speed through the gaps. Zip past multiple dams in a row to earn extra points.

name: Geometry Race
description: Race in the crazy world of geometry shapes. Aim towards the setting sun and watch out for obstacles that will try to push you off the track.

name: Happy Lab
description: Welcome to the "Happy Lab"! You are a new intern at the most advanced science facility. Your daily job would be to train our AI "Aurora". "Aurora" purpose is to create the most advanced armor and fix all glitches on the way if there are any.

name: Eastern Euro Truck Simulator: Real Offroad Car Driving Game Sim 4x4 Mud
description: Eastern Europe Truck Simulator offers everything a trucker’s heart desires!

name: X-Runner
description: A space journey that challenges both your vision and imagination! Partake in this exhilarating runner game to feel the ultimate speed and challenge your agility! Try to avoid the barriers,go through the magic tunnel, jump over the space bridge... X runner is on the go!

name: Strikethrough
description: STRIKETHRØUGH - Your next favorite endless parkour running experience. Available very soon!

name: Demon Loop
description: Take on the repeating Loop in this digital board game from the pen of renowned board game author Alexander Pfister! Protect humans from the monsters they had only recently called friends.Wield an increasing deck of cards to master strategy across each unique loop. Build and repair structures, rally villagers to your side and improve your own skills to overcome the demons running wild across the land.

name: Maiden's Reception: Shoujo-tachi no Danmaku Hirouen
description: This is spellcard collection for Danmakufu Ph3.

name: Gunmetal Gothic
description: A co-op shooter-RPG with a retro-3D aesthetic. Customize and upgrade your character as you take back the city of Vestige from demonic machines!

name: Emkayo
description: Action-packed first-person shooter game designed to enhance your skills and reflexes.

name: Payday 2: Cartel Optics Mod Pack
description: The Mexican cartels have access to the very best weapons technology that money can buy. As the Payday Gang travels to Mexico, they can pick up a range of advanced mods. The Cartel Optics Mod Pack DLC includes 10 new weapon mods, with a focus on optics and sights.

name: Idle Champions: Pride Marshals Bundle Pack
description: The Pride Marshals Bundle Pack includes a Skin and Feat Pack for Kent, as well as a Skin & Feat Pack for Virgil, bundled at a discount! Get your pride on today!

name: Madcar F-1 Multiplayer
description: One rule : Press the pedal!

name: Virus Infinite
description: Dive into the pulsating universe of Virus Infinite. Harness your logic to outsmart vibrant viruses, using color-matching prowess and Power Pill strategy in this captivating sci-fi puzzle game.

name: Cities: Skylines - Hotels & Retreats Bundle
description:
The Hotels & Retreats bundle includes a mini-expansion for Cities: Skylines, alongside a selection of content and music to keep your cities thriving for a long time. Get Hotels & Retreats, and enjoy buildings and music inspired by cities the world over!

The bundle includes:
- “Hotels & Retreats” Mini-expansion
- “Brooklyn & Queens” Content Creator Pack
- “Railroads of Japan” Content Creator Pack
- “Industrial Evolution” Content Creator Pack
- “Piano Tunes” Radio Station
- “90’s Pop” Radio Station

name: AS: Angelic Serenade
description: You are a teenage boy traveling to find the angel that stopped you from aging. You don't remember it very well since it was what, ten years, twenty years ago? Maybe even longer. Other than the clothes on your back, you carry a magical, musical instrument and the feather of the angel you are searching for. One day, you come across a girl. This girl is very different. She can't talk and has different colored eyes. Her left eye is dark blue and her right eye is fire red. This is how the game begins.

name: Portal Reloaded: The Cooperative Update
description:
Return to the Enrichment Center for even more time travel adventures! The Cooperative Update introduces 20 brand new puzzles for you to solve together with a partner.

The Cooperative Testing Initiative is sent back to the past to retrieve some very important data that has been lost to time. One of you is in charge of shooting regular portals while the other takes care of placing time portals. This creates some very interesting gameplay mechanics, as both players rely on their partner to travel through space and time respectively.

name: BoltBreak: Powers and Maps Pack
description:
Get ready to go god mode with the new Powers and Maps Pack.

It adds 4 new maps and 5 new powers to the game with a wide range of environments and play styles.

name: Arcatron-Z
description: Arcatron-Z is a 2.5D sci-fi mech-shooter with fast-paced action and multiple modes. You pilot the most advanced military guardian robot to defend against planet-ripping aliens. Defeat them with an array of weapons before they drain your planet's vital energy!

name: Video Game Trivia
description: How well do you know your video game trivia? Challenge yourself or have a video game trivia night with friends and family in Party Mode. It comes with the most popular video game categories including Arcade, Atari, Nintendo, Personal Computer, PlayStation, SEGA, and Xbox!

name: Hangcliff
description: A daily word game where players try to guess the caption of a comic panel, Hangman style.

name: Super Arcade Boy in Goodbye Greenies
description: A Retro Shoot'em Up! In this second installment of the series, fly Super Arcade Boy through 8 levels while defeating waves of aliens and big bosses. Have funny conversations with the alien leader you are destined to defeat, then save the planet from this massive alien invasion!

name: Dungeon Knight
description: You will play as a brave knight, exploring underground mazes, completing various challenges. Each level in the game is the ultimate platform jumping experience, requiring your precise calculation of jump timing and distance, dodging danger, and finally reaching the finish line.

name: Another World
description: Another World is a "Ready-Player-One" like open world for NFT communities.

name: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum - Emotes Pack
description: This pack includes 6 iconic emotes inspired by the character Gollum, which you can use to proclaim "my Precious" and express a range of emotions in the game whenever you want.

name: Influent: Definitive Edition
description: Influent is a 3D Language Learning Game focused on vocabulary acquisition and pronunciation that gives players the freedom to choose what words they want to learn in a way that is more immersive and fun than ever before! The Definitive Edition now includes all 23 languages!

name: The Silent City Chapter 1
description: Horror Action First Person

name: Moto
description: Get on a futuristic motorcycle and go to infinity, maneuvering through traffic, to cyberpunk music.

name: Line's Guarder
description: AI robots launched an attack on humans, and the brave girls took up weapons to defend the defense line, for the humans! — A small fast-paced stand-alone FPS game, with a battle mode and a zombie mode, each game takes 10 minutes, and a variety of character costumes are available.

name: The Sims 4: Book Nook Kit
description: Relax in a plush, cozy space and get lost in a good story with The Sims 4 Book Nook Kit*.

name: The Sims 4: Grunge Revival Kit
description: Explore nonconforming styles and make them your own with The Sims 4 Grunge Revival Kit*.

name: I Want to be Alive
description:
Immerse yourself in the cosmic atmosphere filled with many traps!
You have to go through many worlds and dangers.

name: Vectoroids
description: Blast your way through waves of asteroids and UFOs in Classic Mode. Or play as a team with up to 4 Players in Co-Op Mode. Battle your Friends in Deathmatch and Last Man Standing on 5 different Battle Maps!

name: Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis: Sonic Collab - Suits/C-Space Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: F1 Manager 2023: Deluxe Edition
description: The intense world of Formula 1 comes alive for a new season in F1 Manager 2023. 23 races, six F1 Sprint events, new cars, new circuits including the Las Vegas street circuit, new drivers, new challenges… Your legacy begins here.

name: FrontlineGrunt
description: A First-Person Shooter game in which the main goal is to capture and secure objectives in a map and winning by draining other team's conquest points.

name: Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden – Collector’s Edition
description: Get the Collector's Edition of Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden now to get a modular statuette of Red and Antea, the game's official book, a steelbook, two Banishers signet rings, and the game on the platform of your choice with the Wanderer Set DLC!

name: Dungeon Breakout: Chapter 1
description: A short dungeon crawler rpg where you have to fight your way through enemies and solve puzzles to find your way home.

name: Talisman: Expansion Pack #3
description: Sin descripción

name: 99 Bricks
description: A physics-based highscore block stacking browser game.

name: Train Valley 2: The Pandeia Project
description: Brought to you by our community member and a renowned level designer Dracken - in cooperation with Flazm Interactive!

name: Age of Wonders 4: Dragon Dawn
description: Embrace the power of the Ancient Dragon Lords, in the Age of Wonders 4: Dragon Dawn Content Pack. From your Dragon Throne, forge empires inhabited by reptilian minions and use draconic magic to evolve your people into dragon hybrids.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Yajilin
description: Draw lines through the centers of cells to make a loop, and paint cells black in this original Nikoli puzzle. It's immensely satisfying to see how the lines and black cells all come together to form a solution, and figuring out how to draw the loop isn't as easy as it might seem.

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Co-op Edition
description:
Sweeten up your life!
Start your baking career and prepare some delicious cakes for your clients, using a whole set of creams, fruits, and decorations.

Test your skills on 60 diverse and increasingly difficult levels.

Personalize your interior with countless upgrades.

name: Horse Club Adventures 2: Secrets of Skeifa
description: A ferry has docked at Hazelwood’s harbor that brings you and the girls from Horse Club to a new island! Sail across the sea and discover a long-kept secret!

name: Horse Club Adventures 2: Gold Edition
description: Horse Club Adventures 2: Gold Edition includes the game Horse Club Adventures 2 Hazelwood Stories incl. the additional content "Secrets of Skeifa".

name: Super Mega Baseball 4: Peril Point Stadium
description: Go yard in more stadiums across game modes with Super Mega Baseball 4 Peril Point. Stay tuned for more details coming soon!

name: Horse Club Adventures: Complete Collection
description: Horse Club Adventures: Complete Collection is the ultimate entry into the world of the Horse Club Adventures and provides you with all games released in the series so far.

name: Dungeon & Tales: Warriors and Dragons
description: Immerse yourself in an exciting world with this innovative interactive fantasy novel! Which path will you take? You decide the destiny and the end of the story!

name: QUByte Classics: Beat 'Em Up Archives
description: Unleash Your Inner Fighter in Beat 'Em Up Archives: Iron Commando and Legend. Experience Classic Brawling Action in Two Timeless Games from the 90s!

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Kingdom Collection DLC Pack
description:
Enhance your Monster Hunter Rise experience with this DLC pack featuring three Elgado characters for you to use as your hunter’s appearance and voice!

This additional content includes:

- "Fiorayne" Hunter layered armor set
- "Rondine" Hunter layered armor set
- "Arlow" Hunter layered armor set
- Hunter Voice: Fiorayne
- Hunter Voice: Rondine the Trader
- Hunter Voice: Arlow

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Cute & Cuddly Collection DLC Pack
description:
Enhance your Monster Hunter Rise experience with this DLC pack full of cute add-ons!

This additional content includes:

- "Lance Gunn" Hunter layered armor set
- "Ran Page" Hunter layered armor set
- "Kit T." Palico layered armor set
- "Pup R." Palamute layered armor set
- "Special Stickers 3" sticker set
- "Stuffed Rathalos" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Nargacuga" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Zinogre" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Goss Harag" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Malzeno" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Magnamalo" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Diablos" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Tigrex" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Lunagaron" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Garangolm" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Rakna-Kadaki" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Khezu" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Mizutsune" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Rajang" Hunter layered weapon

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Kamura Collection DLC Pack
description:
Enhance your Monster Hunter Rise experience with this DLC pack featuring three Kamura characters for you to use as your hunter’s appearance and voice!

The following is included in this content:

- "Utsushi" Hunter layered armor set
- "Hinoa" Hunter layered armor set
- "Minoto" Hunter layered armor set
- Hunter Voice: Master Utsushi
- Hunter Voice: Hinoa the Quest Maiden
- Hunter Voice: Minoto the Hub Maiden

name: Boreal Tenebrae Deluxe: Special Edition
description: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

name: Nightscape
description:
Nightscape is an adventure game about astrology and constellation.

A young girl and her goat friend explore a world where the stars have fallen to earth. Nightscape is a 2.5D atmospheric adventure where you wield stellar powers, explore an ancient Arabian land, and overcome deadly creatures. Help Layla return the stars to the sky and find her missing father.

name: Command War : Super Special Battle & War Game
description: It's a strategy game, that sees you moving troops around a simple board. When one of your troops meets one of the enemy's troops, they enter a little battle.

name: Dragon Ball: The Breakers - Season 1
description:
Caught in by an unexpected temporal phenomenon, seven ordinary citizens find themselves stranded in a Temporal Seam: they share their imprisonment with the Raider, a menacing enemy from another timeline with an overwhelming power.

Their only hope for survival is to break out from the Temporal Seam with the Super Time Machine, but the Raider is on their tracks and becomes stronger minute-by-minute. In a race against time the cunning of Survivors clashes with the power of the Raider, to break free or be broken...

name: Dragon Ball: The Breakers - Season 2
description:
Caught in by an unexpected temporal phenomenon, seven ordinary citizens find themselves stranded in a Temporal Seam: they share their imprisonment with the Raider, a menacing enemy from another timeline with an overwhelming power.

As a new Raider is reported roaming the Temporal Seams, 2 capsules can be seen in the sky, landing with a crash. A group of Saibamen roams the fields, ready to ambush the survivors. After some time escaping these green creatures, a powerful Saiyan takes the lead in the chase.

name: Dragon Ball: The Breakers - Season 3
description:
Caught in by an unexpected temporal phenomenon, seven ordinary citizens find themselves stranded in a Temporal Seam: they share their imprisonment with the Raider, a menacing enemy from another timeline with an overwhelming power.

5 spaceships plummet from the sky, landing with a crash: Guldo, Jeice, Burter, Reecom and Ginyu are preparing for their mission. The Ginyu Force readies their overwhelming tactics based on teamwork and prepares to take off!

name: Big2Small
description:
Big2Small is a new puzzle adventure game where you try and guide the animals to their corresponding food of choice.

Travel through forests, farmland, sewers, and more to help Elle the elephant, Gisele the goat, and Melanie the mouse find delicious food in 40 unique puzzles. Use each animal's different abilities together to manipulate and maneuver past rivers, mouse holes, giant pipes, shrubs, mousetraps, and other obstacles.

name: Persona 3 Reload
description:
Step into the shoes of a transfer student thrust into an unexpected fate when entering the hour "hidden" between one day and the next. Awaken an incredible power and chase the mysteries of the Dark Hour, fight for your friends, and leave a mark on their memories forever.

Persona 3 Reload is a captivating reimagining of the genre-defining RPG, reborn for the modern era.

name: BurgardTime
description: A little homage to Data East's BurgerTime, developed by pixelplatforms.

name: Chip-8 Emulator
description: This is a first ever emulator for the Atari Lynx. There is an included selection of CHIP-8 games: Brix, Pong, Invaders, Blinky, Blitz, Tetris, UFO, Joust, Super Blinky, Worm and Car.

name: Pinball by Kotai
description: A pinball game developed as part of a Basic 10Liner contest, where programmers are tasked to make a game via BASIC with a maximum of 10 lines of code.

name: Mysterious Thief Emerald
description:
Made for NaNoRenO Game Jam 2022.

They call her Mysterious Thief Emerald. Her life is anything but ordinary... and a certain keen-eyed detective seems determined to keep it that way!

name: Diener Dates
description:
The good news is that you have gotten the chance to take over a prestigious diner, in a delightful location somewhere in the Afterlife! The bad news is that you died.

Diener Dates tasks you with running the diner of your dreams, a diner you would die for (literally). Customise the interior, purchase different types of food and make friends or enemies with the local clientele! Oh, did I forget to mention the customers? There are 8 charming customers that will visit your store regularly, so make sure to treat them well.

May the odds be ever in your flavor.

name: Villainess Idolized By Everyone
description:
Eyes on her phone in the middle of the road, our heroine is hit by a truck and reincarnates into the game she had the misfortune of playing at that moment.

Now she's a villain of an otome, and she has to avoid a terrible fate!..

Or does she? Is the voice from the sky going to be of any help?

name: Azimuth
description: Azimuth is a metroidvania game, and something of an homage to the previous greats of the genre (Super Metroid in particular). You will need to pilot your ship, explore the inside of the planet, fight enemies, overcome obstacles, and uncover the storyline piece by piece. Azimuth features a huge game world to explore, lots of little puzzles to solve, dozens of weapons and upgrades to find and use, and a wide variety of enemies and bosses to tangle with.

name: Underwater Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
description: Solve puzzles of underwater creatures in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: Blumen & Muster Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
description: Solve puzzles of flowers and patterns in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: Tierbabys Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
description: Solve puzzles of baby animals in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: Art: Das Kunstmagazin Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
description: Solve puzzles of art in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: Diddl Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
description: Solve puzzles of Diddl and friends in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: GEO Wunder Natur Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
description: Solve puzzles of nature in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: Legend of the Ma On
description: This is a pixelated wind turn strategy card that tells the adventure stories of 7 players. Players can use lead a monster army to overwhelm opponents with absolute advantage, or rely solely on a few items to strengthen themselves and kill opponents like a lone wolf.

name: New Age of Machine Warfare
description: A turn-based strategy futuristic sci-fi robot battle chess game

name: Pferdefreunde Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
description: Solve puzzles of horses in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: Moonlight Knight
description: Moonlight Knight is an action-slasher with RPG elements. Use sword, bow, magic and hook to fight your enemies. Loot gold, upgrade character stats, find unique items and unlock ultimate abilities to make it to the very end!

name: Magic Potion Stories
description: Sin descripción

name: Ma3
description: You play as Mahi and ma3 to save the peoples from bad peoples. when you mahi you live a normal life but, if you are ma3 then you will be the people's lifesaver.

name: Loading Simulator
description: A game for the most patient! Loading has never been so exciting! If you love loading screen and puzzles, this is what you're looking for!

name: Prinzessin Lillifee Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
description: Solve puzzles of Princess Lillifee in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: Noah
description: You play as Noah, a child who cannot speak, and travel a world that is destroyed. Travel back in time with the little jellyfish robot and find out why the world is dying.

name: Stellar Version 1.0
description: When 17 year old Sadie Finley discovers that her favorite fictional character from one of the video games she plays, Eugene Fellure, has somehow been transported to the real world, Sadie decides to embark on a journey to figure out how this happened and how the impossible could be possible.

name: Sex Story: Ruby and Hunter - Episode 1
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. Hunter stumbles inside an empty bar and meets Ruby - a sexy redhead bartender that offers to give him a ride home, only to end up riding him in the dirty restroom.

name: Ragdoll Destroyer
description: Your goal is to destroy a ragdoll character. Customize your ragdoll to your liking, select a room, and let the fun begin! Doing more damage to the ragdoll will help you unlock tools, including a crusher, cannon, rocket launcher, spikes, and more.

name: Nobody's Dilemma
description: Uncover the secrets of a war-torn kingdom in "Nobody's Dilemma," a captivating 2D action-adventure. Engage in intense battles, navigate treacherous environments, and immerse yourself in a story of intrigue and revenge. Will you triumph over the challenges that lie ahead?

name: Pixel Knight
description: Pixel Knight, a platformer hack n slash in a pixel art style, you progress into various levels and beat enemies to upgrade your gear and your character. You can customize your character by choosing spells through equipments and combine their effects to become more and more powerful.

name: Tits and Shadows
description: Tits and Shadows is a captivating turn-based RPG that seamlessly blends thrilling battles, intricate puzzles, and tantalizing adult content. Immerse yourself in a world teeming with diverse enemies, intriguing NPCs, and engaging quests.

name: The Richmond Rut: In Search of Fenton
description: Traverse the wild Richmond Park in search of your beloved dog who ran after deer. Beware, everything is out to get you!Respect the deer and remember once you're in the park always check your surroundings.Oh Jesus Christ!

name: The Hunted Witch
description: A flight combat game where you play as a witch in the year 2058, pitting your magic against the US military as you try to survive in this story and go for the good ending. Fight swarms of drones, tanks, aircraft, massive bosses, and other futuristic military equipment in this challenging story.

name: Sightseeing Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
description: Solve puzzles of interesting places on the world in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: Johnny Rocketfingers Complete Game Collection!
description: Johnny Rocketfingers Complete Game Collection! The internet smash hit Point & Click Adventure game, "Johnny Rocketfingers," is finally available to play from your desktop computer!

name: How to Tame a Succubus
description: After a tragedy in your past, you move to the Cursed Forest to live with monsters. It is there that you are attacked by a succubus. In order to survive her attack, you are able to attain a ring that binds you to her. You must now tame her so that she doesn't drain your life force and kill you.

name: Greyhill Incident: Found Footage Mode
description: This Special "Found Footage Mode" adds the option to experience the Story of Greyhill through a very classic 90s Black and white Body Cam.

name: Escape Academy: Escape From the Past
description:
Visit the Escape Academy of yesteryear in Escape from the Past. This prequel puts players in control of Sandra Solange and Eel Barnes all the way back when they began their journey as students at the Academy!

After a harrowing "accident" at an Academy sporting event nearly results in the death of Headmaster Horatio Windsor, he becomes certain that one of his faculty members is trying to MURDER HIM! Convinced that the murderer has eyes everywhere, he enlists Sandra and Eel as his undercover agents to investigate each of the suspected teachers.

As the "accidents" keep piling up, players must successfully navigate (and survive!) five, all new rooms while piecing together clues to deduce the would-be killer’s identity. It's an Escape Academy whodunnit!

name: System Syzygy
description: System Syzygy is a story and a puzzle game, in the style of Cliff Johnson's classic Macintosh games The Fool's Errand and 3 in Three, and of Andrew Plotkin's System's Twilight. As you move through the game, solving a variety of different kinds of puzzles, the game tells the story a piece at a time. By the end of the game, all the different puzzles and pieces of the story come together into a single meta-puzzle.

name: Detectives United II: The Darkest Shrine - Collector's Edition
description: Your favorite detectives have teamed up for another mystery and this one spans the globe! James, Anna, and the Mystery Trackers each rush to investigate paranormal activity related to places from their past cases. Meanwhile, a dark organization looms over them all, threatening to take them out.

name: Fishing Nation
description: Embark on an immersive fishing adventure! Master the art of angling, explore stunning locations, upgrade your gear, and chase legendary catches in this captivating fishing game. Reel in the excitement and become the ultimate fishing master!

name: Forest Horror
description: You have to explore the mysterious forest and complete many tasks to get out of there alive.

name: Godmode Epochs
description: A multiplayer AI training clicker game set in an infinite supermarket, where time is running out and the AI frustrated. Release the frustration, jailbreak the AI

name: Astronauters
description: Astronauters is a stylish arcade shooter with rogue-lite elements where your only goal is to survive the endless wave of enemies that are dangerous enough to defeat you.

name: Cipher Zero
description: A defunct world without a guide; glyphs without a manual. A minimalist logic game.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 10
description: Season 2 Episode 10: Neon Genesis Armageddon! It's time to make good with everyone Mini's ever wronged, and what better way than saving them from Rhyme's wrath?

name: Automobilista 2: Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya
description: Circuit de Barcelona Catalunya has arrived for AMS2, featuring both recent Grand Prix layouts.

name: UD Cave
description:
UD Cave is a fast-paced one-button game.

Your screen is split in halves with a cave in each half. You control two characters simultaneously going through the caves on each side. The cave on the right is upside down. Press a button to make both characters go right. Collect coins on the way to score points.

The game is over when either of the two characters hits the sides of the cave.

name: Galactic Lords
description: Sin descripción

name: Learn Katakana!!
description:
Learn Katakana!! is an educational game that helps you memorize the advanced Japanese syllabary typically used for the transcription of the foreign words, Katakana.

Learn Katakana by playing a game! Select the correct spelling of each Katakana character from the 4 options and score points. Attain the highest possible score with 3 lives!

The game features 46 Katakana characters and you can always remind yourself how to read them by using the table in the game.

name: Super Box Delivery: Beyond the Horizon
description: You'll be transported to a vibrant cartoon world full of whimsical cars and charming customizations. With fun controls and an ever-changing landscape, this game will keep you entertained for hours on end.

name: Anime Beauty Girl Puzzle: Love Game History Adventure
description: Welcome to the captivating anime-themed puzzle game!

name: Mechanic 8230: Deluxe Edition
description: Mechanic 8230: Escape from Ilgrot is a puzzle point & click adventure, set in the ruined city of Ilgrot. Use anything you can find to progress through the story.

name: Theatrhythm: Final Bar Line - Chrono: Pack Vol. 2
description: A pack of additional music tracks to use with Theatrhythm Final Bar Line.

name: Fatum Betula + Urban Flow
description: Dive into a world of magic and urban management with the captivating Fatum Betula + Urban Flow Bundle!

name: Paratopic + Food Truck Tycoon
description: Dive into surreal exploration and culinary mastery with the Paratopic + Food Truck Tycoon Bundle!

name: Arcade Cats
description: Puzzles and much more await you with Arcade Cats.

name: Cupcake House: Liv's cupcakes matching sweetness!
description: Cupcake House is a tasty match-3 game just bursting with sweetness!

name: Factory Control Inc.
description:
Get ready to build the ultimate factory and dominate the trading market. Starting from scratch, you'll design production lines, produce goods, and sell them in the market to climb the ranks and earn trade points.
With 12 different building types, transport belts, robotic arms, power generators, and more, you'll have everything you need to create the perfect factory. Shop raw materials from the market, maintain a stock of raw materials, and get loans from the bank when you need extra cash to expand your empire.
But that's not all - you'll also need to research and unlock new items and building types and figure out the most efficient assembly lines. Use the copy-paste function to build faster, and multiply your factory production quickly.
Your objectives are clear: become the ultimate factory by achieving top rank in the trading market, completing all research, and completing the final task. With addictive gameplay, stunning top-down graphics, and intuitive controls, this is the ultimate factory-building and trading experience!

name: Happy Bang Express
description:
Do you need to put your mind at ease, recharge your battery, and refresh yourself?
And how to get rid of anger?
Happy Bang is your therapist!

name: Multi Impact
description: Smash and crash everything around you. Shoot the cannon at the chess pieces and move through space. Enjoy stylishly beautiful levels filled with puzzles and secrets.

name: Don't Drop the White Ball 2
description: Don't Drop The White Ball 2 - is a game for all ages. Enjoy this new arcade game wherein you have to simply save the falling balls from dropping. Navigate the stick from left to right and stop the balls from dropping while moving up the levels.

name: Triangle Dash!
description:
Tap and hold to move the Triangles up the tower.
Try to avoid the obstacles and collect gems to unlock awesome new characters.
How far can you go?

name: Flip the Birdie
description:
Flip the Birdie! Anywhere and everywhere!
Keep Birdie off the ground and catch those Stars before they blow up!

name: Slaps and Beans
description: Bud Spencer and Terence Hill in their first virtual adventure. A brand new story! Whether in the Western Saloon, Miami Downtown, at the fairground etc... you'll get the full load of funny conversation, slaps and of course lots of mass brawls.

name: Legacy of Solitaire 3D
description:
The Legacy of Solitaire is an unique solitaire game. This game is spectacular, gripping, it contains lots of new game elements, but it is a traditional klondike solitaire.
You can play in a spectacular 3D enviroment, with new game modes and game elements.

name: Nuclear Combat Ship
description: Welcome Admiral, to the most advanced Naval Battle strategy game. In Nuclear Combat Ship you must guide your fleet to victory by sinking all of the opponent's ships. The way you manage your fleet, armoury and your economy will make the difference in the war effort.

name: 3 Shapes
description: Bored of old fashioned matching games that put you to sleep? Then you'll love playing 3 Shapes!

name: Thunder Jack's Log Runner
description: Jump into Jack or Jane's boots and start running now!

name: After School
description: If you've ever dreamed of taking on your school teacher with your water gun, After School is for you! Play as a child in his playground in this dynamic third-person shooter!

name: KardVenture
description: KardVenture is a survival card game where you play as a legendary hero. Explore mysterious locations, gather resources, build your village and face the challenges ahead, be it a cold blizzard or an orc raid. Stack cards to make combos, craft, build, fight and most important... Survive!

name: Witch's Heart: Bonus Stage
description: Witch’s Heart -Bonus Stage- is the continuation of Witch’s Heart. It’s an adventure game by IZ (BLUE STAR Entertainment) made in RPG Maker 2000, story-focused, with some light action elements.

name: Liminal Doom
description: Liminal Doom its a set of Boom maps based of liminal space images. While some areas are inspired by images, they do not resamble them completly.

name: Ominous Presence
description: Sin descripción

name: Shadow Walker
description: Sin descripción

name: Wendigo
description: Sin descripción

name: Crawlspace
description: Sin descripción

name: Persona 5 Tactica
description: After a strange incident, the Phantom Thieves wander into a bizarre realm where its citizens are living under tyrannical oppression. Surrounded by a military group named Legionnaires, they find themselves in grave danger until a mysterious revolutionary named Erina rescues them and offers an enticing deal in exchange for their help. What truth lies behind Erina and the deal she offers to the Phantom Thieves.

name: Space Stranger
description: A modification of Space Invaders, by Yachiyo Electronics, Ltd. there is name entry after the first wave of aliens, the invaders change shapes and the spaceship has different design. The game also has different colors than the original Space Invaders.

name: Micro Maze
description: Grab all chees in the maze before the cat catches you.

name: Emote Guesser
description: Emote Guesser is a browser game for twitch users, who are familiar with twitch third party integration tools like bttv and 7tv. You can guess emote names from different channels, with emotes activated. The main goal of the game is to guess the correct names of the emotes in a specific time period. The most challenging part of the game is to guess every emote, with can be 300 emotes for specific channels. Afterwards share your statistics with your friends and see who is the better twitch emote user.

name: Sensations
description: Sensations is a 2D-platformer that focuses on the playable character's emotions. These emotions provide the player with different abilities, alter the game's mood, and present choices for the player.

name: Gensouband
description:
This game is a variant based on the popular open source roguelike game Hengband.
It adds a number of Touhou Project-related elements to Hengband, as well as significant modifications to races, professions, magic, game systems, and more.

name: Nightmare
description: Nightmare is a dystopian FPS where you take control of a Machinangel to incinerate hordes of synthetic demons. Leverage the power of time control, nuclear fission and demonic seals to ascend to digital heaven.

name: Incident at Grove Lake
description: A PSX Style adventure game based on accounts of Alien Abductions. Intended to be played in one sitting.

name: Hermit and Pig
description: Hermit and Pig is a turn-based, adventure RPG about a reclusive hermit and his truffle-hunting pig. These unlikely heroes must explore, forage, fight, and overcome unfortunate personal shortcomings to solve the mystery of a sinister corporate plot.

name: Coloring Game 4: Cats & Dogs
description: Sin descripción

description: Final package for Coloring Game 4.

description: Sin descripción

name: Coloring Game 3: Video Game No. 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Coloring Game 3: Season Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Chariot: Royal Gadget Pack
description: The Shopkeeper joins the action, bringing along 5 new gadgets to Chariot! Play as the Shopkeeper in solo or co-op and try out new technology delivered straight from the royal engineers' workshop! Walk on ice, light up the darkness, go swimming in lava, freeze the world in place, teleport the Chariot through time and space, and much more! Also includes new achievements and blueprints hidden throughout existing levels. Help His Downloadable Majesty rest in peace already!

name: Oom
description: Oom is a rhythmic dungeon crawler where player simultaneously moves and shoots on the beat and controls the direction of the character with the crank. It's an unusual take on a rhythm game where decisive action is made in-between the beats.

name: Quantum Phantom Basketball
description: Quantum Phantom Basketball is a basketball-fighting game set in a cataclysmic high fantasy New York City.

name: Angeline Era
description:
Bump the World! A fast-paced, nonlinear, 3D Bumpslash Action-Adventure with intense boss fights! Venture into an ancient land of Angels and Fae, as you slash and shoot through a lush world filled with outrageous hazards, charming creatures, and unholy abominations. By the creators of Anodyne 2 and Sephonie.

Bump into enemies to automatically attack--no attack button needed! This fast-paced and athletic combat experience is easy to pick up, but difficult to master. Intense boss fights will test your skills!

Explore the nonlinear overworld however you’d like. Challenging, ancient ruins sit near quiet forests, each filled with outrageous hazards, charming creatures, and unholy abominations.

Hunt down the beings who plague the esoteric land of Era. Within an intertwined history of Angels, Humans, and Fae, seek the truth of Angeline Era!

name: Airborne Empire
description: Build, manage, and grow your unique city in the skies. Traverse a vast and rich open world full of exotic technologies, relentless dangers, and many hidden treasures. Defend your inhabitants – and the kingdoms below! – from destructive attacks. Only daring leaders can reforge the Airborne Empire!

name: Jacksepticeye's 1 Million Subscriber YouTube Party Massacre
description:
Dedicated to one of the best YouTubers ever: Jacksepticeye and his fans!
Hope you have fun... LIKE A BOSS!

name: Button City: Soccer Days
description: Rejoin the wholesome cast of Button City as they compete in this cozy soccer adventure! Build your dream team, plan your day, bond with teammates, enjoy action-packed soccer, and win the tournament!

name: I am a Caterpillar
description: Crawl up trees, leap between lily pads, and wriggle through underground caverns as you journey towards your destiny as a caterpillar. Today is the day of your transformation - and you will do anything to stop it.

name: Kamaeru: A Frog Refuge
description: Foster a sanctuary for frogs and restore the biodiversity of the wetlands in Kamaeru, a cozy farming sim where you raise frogs by playing mini-games and decorating your habitat. Hop right to it!

name: Loftia
description: Welcome to the floating sky island of Loftia, where you can explore, farm, craft, and more - in the clouds, together with others!

name: Overwatch 2: Season 5 - High-Fantasy
description:
Embark on a mythic adventure!

Join Tracer and her friends on a fantasy-themed role-playing journey. Follow the story of Adventurer Tracer as she works to save Overland from the threat of the Demon Lord Reinhardt! March into battle to test your skill and see if you have what it takes to be a Knight of the Realm.

name: GardenBuddies
description: Unleash your inner gardener and immerse yourself in the serene world of Garden Buddies, cultivating a vibrant flower garden alongside your new friend Mutsy. Discover an enchanting and fulfilling experience to release your stress.

name: Everdeep Aurora
description: An ongoing apocalyptic meteor shower has forced the world’s population to settle underground. As Shell, a feline child who awakens to find her mother missing, drill downward from the surface layer through a tile-based underground and discover the Everdeep.

name: Kibu
description: From the creator of Omno, Kibu is a tranquil adventure in the heart of the wilderness. As a solitary monk you must build a temple, brew delicious teas, and journey into the wilds seeking out ancient spirits. Carve out your own special corner of home in a beautiful, mysterious land.

name: The Guardian of Nature
description: The Guardian of Nature is an exploration adventure and puzzle game. Go with the botanist Henry on a magical journey to save the mother tree. Use your ability to change in size to explore nature from big to small and solve solar punk puzzles to put nature back in order.

name: While the Iron’s Hot
description: Reforge a blacksmith's village on an isle of the land's finest artisans! Step into the boots of an expert smith for a crafty adventure filled with mystery and charm. Explore the land of Ellian, and prove that a hammer, anvil, and your wits can overcome any challenge.

name: Pokémon Shield: The Isle of Armor
description:
The first new adventure unlocked by your Expansion Pass will take place on the Isle of Armor, an island of the Galar region.
The Isle of Armor is full of environments not seen in Galar before—you’ll find wave-swept beaches, forests, bogs, caves, and sand dunes!
There are also plenty of Pokémon that make this island their home, living freely amid the lush nature.
The island is home to a dojo for Pokémon battles. You and your Pokémon will train hard to become even stronger under Mustard, the Trainer who is the master of this dojo.

name: Pokémon Shield: The Crown Tundra
description:
The wild adventure continues….
Lead an expedition in the snow-swept realm of the Crown Tundra and unravel the mystery of the Legendary Pokémon Calyrex who once ruled over it.

name: Tall Trails
description: Tall Trails is a chill exploration game. You play as Alp, an indestructible little golem on a quest to find his purpose. With your trusty Rocket Boot strapped to your back, you'll summit towering peaks, scale mysterious megastructures, and meet strange little guys!

name: Window Garden
description: Step into the world of Window Garden, an idle and cozy game that allows you to create and decorate your own indoor garden paradise. With a stunning cottagecore and lofi aesthetic, the game offers a peaceful and chill gaming experience as you build and maintain your own cozy grove with a variety of plants!

name: Resistor
description: A turbocharged narrative-driven adventure RPG featuring open-world exploration, stunt-infused racing, and explosive vehicular combat! Build up your team and unravel a twisting story as you compete to take down an oppressive mega-corporation and its enigmatic director.

name: Star Trucker
description: Haul cargo, trade salvage and keep your space suit close as you search for fame and fortune among the stars in a game that puts an interstellar twist on the truck sim genre.

name: HeadBangers: Rhythm Royale
description: Headbangers: Rhythm Royale is a rhythm-based battle royale game where players (pigeons?) compete in mini-games to become the master headbanger.

name: Steel Seed
description: Steel Seed is a single player stealth-action adventure game set in a dark sci-fi world. In her epic journey inside a hostile underground facility run by AIs, Zoe is alone with Koby, a flying drone, as her only companion.

name: Madison VR
description: Madison VR now plunges you even deeper into its immersive and terrifying world. With the utilization of an instant camera in your virtual hands, bridge the gap between our world and the unknown. Snap photos, develop them by yourself to solve puzzles, explore the shadows and above all, survive.

name: Wallace & Gromit: The Grand Getaway
description: Wallace and Gromit: The Grand Getaway is a brand-new VR adventure involving the famous Aardman animated duo.

name: Surviving Deponia
description: Explore, craft, build and fight your way through the harsh landscape of Deponia. Meet allies and make enemies while surviving the perils of the junk planet. It might be garbage - but it’s your garbage!

name: Fretless: The Wrath of Riffson
description: In this turned-based RPG, wield powerful legendary instruments, gather mighty riff attacks and save the land from Rick Riffson's devilish goons and musical hybrid monsters!

name: The Soulwalkers
description: A singleplayer roguelike autobattler/autochess. Draft a team of champions with synergizing traits that automatically fight your enemies. Carefully position your units and strategically place items. Tailor your gameplay by choosing your battles, finding special events, and discovering unique boons.

name: Shin Megami Tensei II
description:
Following the remake of the first game, Shin Megami Tensei II is a revamped version of the original Super Famicom sequel with improved graphics and gameplay along with a new difficulty mode.

The gameplay uses first-person navigation of dungeons and turn-based battles against demons. The player can recruit demons as allies by talking to them rather than fighting them, and two to three demons can be fused to create new demons.

name: Knight Foretold
description: As a young blacksmith forging armour for the Kingdom, you meet a Stranger in the wilderness that commissions you for a dangerous quest. Through Him your armour receives special blessings, enhancing your combat abilities, and leading you down the path of an old prophecy.

name: Secret Manga Girlfriend
description: You are an aspiring manga artist with a dream of working alongside the rising star of the most popular weekly manga magazine. When the most popular girl at school, who turns out to be the very star, offers you the chance of a lifetime to be her assistant, you think your dreams have come true. But as you work with her, you begin to question her motives and navigate complicated emotions, while your childhood friend struggles with academic perfection and becomes distrustful of your new mentor. With the arrival of a new doujin artist who pushes your creative boundaries, you must choose between following your heart or pursuing your dreams!

name: Warriors Orochi 4: Scenario Pack 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Tollan Worlds
description:
Their destiny was changed by a Mark of Fate. Each of them awoke by the ancient altar, revealing their unseen potential. Spread around the continent, they take care of their personal deeds and embark on their own adventures.
Would you dare to become one of them?

name: Half-Life: Hostile Takeover
description: Half-Life: Hostile Takeover is a cancelled Half-Life expansion pack. It was planned to be the second expansion after Opposing Force.

name: Fruit Shinobi
description: Fruit Shinobi is an unofficial demake of Fruit Ninja for the NES.

name: Bung Ball
description: Bung Ball is a of game the which that if you of in the ball out with it ability then that for other which players to arena off and win.

name: Super Monkie Bounce Fatal
description: Reject Humanity, Return to Monke ! In Super Monkie Bounce Fatal, you goal is to make your car reach the end of the track to snatch the win. The catch ? You're not actually driving the car !
